loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy ingredients (chicken, oil, beans, cheese and eggs)

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en: Agnes is 35 years old. She has 4 children between 2 and 14 years of age, only 1 is in school. Her husband is a businessman. Agnes owns a general stores where she has been selling rice, salt, and other items for the past 1 and a half years. Business has improved their standards of living. Agnes needs a loan to buy more goods to sell in her store. She wishes to save her profits.

loans.use: to buy items to fill her store.

loans.name: Hector

texts.es:
Hector de 36 años, es soltero, vive en su casa propia, la cual cuenta con servicio sólo de luz, ubicada  de Pomahuaca que pertenece al departamento de Cajamarca.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad  agrícola, ganadera y turística (cuenta con museos y sitios arqueológicos muy bonitos).

Desde hace varios años Hector cuenta con un espacio amplio que lo alquila como cochera en al zona donde vive, es un negocio rentable ya que no tiene competencia, con los ingresos que obtenga puede solventar todos sus gastos personales.

Ha solicitado Hector un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa  de 2000 nuevos soles para la compra de un portón metálico de segunda mano pero en buen estado y para ampliar su cochera ya que cuenta con espacio, con los cambios que va realizar sus clientes van aumentar y por lo mismo sus ganancias, lo que le permitirá cubrir su crédito y al tener mejoras económicas, tendrá más comodidades en su casa.
texts.en:
Hector, age 36, is single and lives in his own home which only has electricity. His home is located in Pomahuaca, which belongs to the Cajamarca department. This zone is characterized by agricultural, livestock, and tourist activity (it has very beautiful archeological sites and museums).

For several years Hector has had a large space, in the zone where he lives, which he rents out as a garage. This is a profitable business because he has no competition. With his income, he is able to cover all of his personal costs.

Hector has requested a loan of 2000 soles from Edpyme Alternativa for the purchase of a second-hand but good-condition metal door, and to expand his garage. These changes will increase his customer base and thus his earnings, which will allow him to pay off his loan and have better economic conditions. He will have more comforts in his home.

loans.use: to purchase a door, and expand his garage.

loans.name: Katherine Janet

texts.es:
Katherine tiene 29 años de edad, ella es  casada y vive junto a sus hijos en hogar propio, ella reside en la localidad de Cayalti 1 hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo, en su comunidad comúnmente se dedican a la comercio, agricultura y ganadería.

Katherine se dedica a venta y crianza de animales menores y aves de corral, ella cría gallinas, patos, pavos y gallinas en la parte posterior de su domicilio y cuando estos ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo las ofrece en venta a las personas interesadas  de la zona en donde reside. 

Katherine desea adquirir alimentos para sus animales asi como animales pequeños para su cría, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 800 nuevos soles, para que pueda alcanzar sus objetivos

Katherine es una madre bastante entregada a su familia y siempre vela por su bienestar y desarrollo. Las personas que la conocen le tienen mucha estima y cariño.
texts.en:
Katherine is 29. She is married and lives with her children in her own home in the Cayalti locality, one hour from the city of Chiclayo. In her community it is common for people to work in trade, agriculture and livestock.

Katherine sells and raises small animals and barnyard birds. She raises hens, ducks and turkeys in the back of her house. When these animals have reached a good level of development, she offers them for sale to interested residents of the zone where she lives.

Katherine wants to acquire feed for her animals, as well as small animals to raise. For this reason she has decided to request a loan of 800 soles from Edpyme Alternativa, so that she can reach her goals.

Katherine is a very dedicated mother who is always looking out for her family's well-being and development. Those who know her love her and hold her in high esteem.

loans.use: to acquire feed for her animals, as well as small animals for raising.

loans.name: Amador

texts.es:
Amador de 48 años de edad, vive con su familia en su casa propia, la cual cuenta sólo con servicio de luz, ubicada en el distrito de Oyotún que pertenece a la provincia de Chiclayo.  Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad comercio, agricultura, ganadería y turismo.

La actividad que desarrolla Amador es la agricultura, cuenta con sus propias tierras de cultivo donde siembra arroz, una vez que realiza su cosecha su producto los ofrece a los diferentes mercados de Chiclayo y así puede obtener mayores ingresos para cubrir sus gastos de su hogar. 

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 3000 nuevos soles para comprar semillas, fertilizantes para mejorar sus tierras como su producto y pago de mano de obra, con la finalidad de ofertar su producto a un mejor precio a los comerciantes y así mejorar económicamente.  Amador es un padre de familia que se preocupa por que su familia mejore y que sus hijos tengan otras oportunidades en un futuro cercano.
texts.en:
Amador, 48, lives with his family in his own house which only has electricity and is located in Oyotún District which belongs to Chiclayo Province, an area noted for commerce, farming, raising livestock and tourism.

Amador is a farmer.  He has his own fields where he grows rice.  Once it’s harvested he sells it in various markets in Chiclayo in order to obtain higher income and be able to cover his household expenses.

He has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 3000 new sol loan to buy seed and fertilizer to improve his land’s productivity with the aim in mind of being able to sell his products for a higher price and thus improve economically.  Amador is a father who is concerned that his family improves and that his children have other opportunities in the near future.
.

loans.use: to buy seed, fertilizer and to pay labor costs.

loans.name: Madeleine

texts.en:
Madeleine is a 33 year old Rwandan entrepreneur. She is married and has 2 children, 6 and 11 years old, both of whom are in school.  

For the past 2 years, Madeleine has been running a general store with her husband, selling goods such as sunflower oil, Vaseline, and shoes. This successful business has enabled her to improve the standard of living for herself and her family.

She will use this loan to purchase more goods to sell in her store so that she can continue to generate more profits to support her family. She plans to reinvest in her store so that it will continue to grow. She also hopes to earn enough profits in order to build a family house.

loans.use: To purchase good to sell.

loans.name: Indiana Maria

texts.es: Indiana Maria tiene 45 años, su actividad es brindar el servicio de mercadería en general. A como muchas mujeres Indiana ha luchado por salir adelante todos los días de su vida, ella tiene 2 hijos menores de edad a su cargo ellos tiene 14 y 18 años respectivamente Indiana trabaja todos los días desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 8 de la noche, pues tiene que movilizarse diariamente para ofrecer la gran variedad de productos ya que no solamente ofrece de manera ambulante también en su vivienda. El crédito es para la compra de sabanas, toallas, ropa en general, cremas y calzado.
texts.en: Indiana Maria is 45 years old.  She makes her living selling general merchandise.  Like many women, she has struggled to get ahead every day of her life.  She has two minor children in her care, ages 14 and 18 respectively.  Indiana works everyday from 7:00 in the morning until 8:00 at night.  As she offers a wide variety of products on foot as well as at her home, she has to mobilize herself daily.  She will use the loan to purchase sheets, towels, general clothing, cream, and footwear

loans.use: to purchase sheets, towels, general clothing, cream, and footwear.

loans.name: Ruth Maria

texts.es:
Ruth, vive con su familia, dos hijas de 16 y 18 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de merienda, este negocio es rentable porque cerca tiene la escuela, donde ofrece a los estudiantes y profesores sus platillos típicos de comida.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de mercadería para el negocio, como queso, pollo, condimentos, aceite y bebidas, le ayudara esta compra a tener disponibilidad de productos, con los que puede mejorar el negocio.
Su aspiración es que el negocio sea rentable y cuente con mayor número de clientes, para así garantizar una mayor ganancia económica.
texts.en: Ruth lives with her family, two daughters who are 16 and 18 years old. She is dedicated to selling packed lunches. This business is profitable because nearby is a school where she offers her typical food dishes to students and teachers. She is requesting a loan for the purchase of merchandise for the business, such as cheese, chicken, condiments, oils and drinks. This purchase will help her ensure products are available and allow her to improve the business. Her aspiration is that the business is profitable and that she has a greater number of customers so she may guarantee more income.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise like chicken, condiments, oil and drinks (soda and juices)

loans.name: Iris

texts.en:
Iris is 30 years old and lives with her partner. She is currently a student at the National University of San Antonio Abad Cusco, where she studies accounting. In addition, she is a docent at a local Inca museum in the city of Cusco. 

Iris works very hard in school and she is passionate about pursuing a career in accounting. She is asking for a 400 dollar loan in order to help pay for university. She is committed to making all of the necessary payments on time.

loans.use: to help pay for her university.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es:
Isabel tiene 41 años de edad, ella es casada y tiene 01 hijo.  Ella vive en casa propia, la misma que esta localizada en el caserío El Porvenir Hualtaco III, en el distrito de Tambogrande, pero aún  no cuenta con servicios básicos en dicha localidad, por ser zona rural.

Isabel se dedica a la venta de prendas de vestir, desde hace más de 01 año, en  su propio domicilio, donde atiende todos los días a sus vecinos y clientes conocidos. Ella con experiencia en el rubro y por su buen trabajo a podido conseguir clientela fija para su negocio. 

Isabel tiene deseos de seguir emprendiendo en el crecimiento de su negocio, para lo que necesita comprar mercadería (prendas de vestir). Ella desea ampliar su negocio y ofrecer más variedad en sus clientes, para las diferentes ocasiones y  por  ende seguir creciendo en su actividad. Por ello esta solicitando un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa  de 2000 nuevos soles, para cumplir dichos objetivos.

Isabel es una mujer bastante trabajadora y empeñosa, las personas que le conocen  le tienen estima por su buen carácter y amabilidad.
texts.en:
Isabel, 41, is married and has a son.  She lives in her own house that’s located in the hamlet of El Porvenir Hualtaco III in Tambogrande District.  Because this is a rural area, it still does not have basic utilities.

Isabel has been selling clothing for over a year at home where she tends to her neighbors and known customers every day.  With her experience in this line of work and because of her hard work she’s managed to establish a regular clientele for her business.

Isabel wants to continue to stimulate her business’ growth and to do so she needs to buy more merchandise (articles of clothing).  She wants to expand the business and offer more variety for all occasions to her customers and thus continue growing in her activity.  Because of this she’s asking Edpyme Alternativa for a 2000 new sol loan to reach said objectives.

Isabel is quite a hard working, dedicated woman.  People who know her hold her in high regard because of her good character and kindness.

loans.use: to buy seasonal clothing.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es:
Margarita de 37 años de edad, vive con su esposo e hijos en su casa propia, cuenta con servicio de agua y luz, ubicada en la zona urbana del  departamento de Lambayeque.  Esta zona se caracteriza por ser agrícola, ganadera y turística.

Margarita se dedica a la confección y venta de prendas de vestir, desde hace varios años, negocio que a instalado en su domicilio, cuenta con su propia clientela y también realiza trabajos a pedidos, la competencia en el rubro no es mucha y con los ingresos que obtenga podrá cubrir sus necesidades familiares.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa mediante Capital Semilla de 2000 para comprar una máquina remalladora y de material como tela e hilos para seguir elaborando sus prendas de vestir. Con el buen servicio que brinda y cumpliendo con los pedidos que le han hecho, le permitirá tener más ganancias para mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.  Margarita con mucho esfuerzo y trabajo a sabido sacar su negocio adelante, al igual que a su familia para ser cada vez mejores.
texts.en:
Margarita is 37 years old.  She lives with her husband and children in her own house, which has water and electrical services.  They live in an urban zone in the Lambayeque department.  This zone is known for farming, raising livestock, and tourism.

Margarita has been making and selling clothes for several years.  This business is set up in her home.  She has her own customers, and she also does work by orders.  There is not much competition in this line of work.  With the income she will get she will be able to cover the family necessities. 

She has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternative through its Seed Capital 2000 program.  She will use the loan to buy an overlocker (a machine that finishes seams) and supplies like fabric and thread in order to continue making clothes.  The good service that she offers and finishing the orders that have been made will allow her to have more income in order to improve her family’s quality of life.  With great effort and work Margarita has known how to get ahead in her business.  She has also gotten her family ahead in order to keep improving.

loans.use: to buy an overlock machine and material to keep making clothes.

loans.name: Etienne

texts.en:
Etienne is a 45 year old Rwandan entrepreneur. He has 7 children between the ages of 6 months and 21 years. 3 are in school, 2 have finished school, and 2 have yet to start. His wife is a businesswoman as well.

For the past 5 years, Etienne has been running a store selling bicycle and motorcycle spare parts. This business has enabled him to pay the school fees for his many children. He will use this loan to purchase more spare parts that will sustain his business. With future profits, he plans to begin building a house and dreams of opening a wholesale spare parts shop.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for sale.

loans.name: Estebana

texts.es:
Estebana, tiene 62 años D. edad, es casada y vive con su esposo y tres hijos, D. los cuales dos trabajan y uno padece síndrome Down, Estebana se dedica al procesamiento D. lácteos y cultivo D. maíz, tiene más D. 20 años D. estar dedicada a esta actividad.
Actualmente su esposo se encuentra dedicado a sembrar nuevamente la milpa, por lo que Estebana solicita un préstamo para la compra D. abono y pesticidas para la siembra. Este crédito le ayudara para abonar y cuidar el cultivo D. las plagas, aumentando así la producción.
Ella quiere seguir adelante, con mucho entusiasmo para apoyar a sus hijos con su trabajo en los lácteos y la agricultura.
texts.en: Estebana is 62 years old.  She is married and lives with her husband and three children, two of whom are working and the other has Down's Syndrome.  Estebana works processing dairy products as well as growing corn which she has been doing for more than 20 years.  Currently, her husband is planting again using the milpa system.  For this reason Estebana is requesting a loan to purchase fertilizer and pesticides for planting.  This will help her fertilize and protect her crops from insects and thereby, increase her production. She wants to move forward enthusiastically to support her children with her work processing dairy products and with farming.

loans.use: purchase fertilizer and pesticides to grow corn.

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es:
Maria Isabel es un señora de 38 años de edad quien vive con su esposo y tres hijos, uno de diecinueve y el otro de dieciséis años de edad y el otro de doce años de edad, en una pequeña comunidad llamada la Trinchera de Pital localizada en la provincia de Alajuela; cuyas principales actividades productivas son la ganadería y la agricultura, donde destaca el cultivo de la pina; siendo estas  comercializadas principalmente en los mercados internacionales. Por esta razón, el desarrollo de la comunidad ha venido creciendo en los últimos anos generando una mayor demanda de productos y servicios brindando mayores oportunidades de trabajo.
Ella se dedica a creación de prendas, para todo tipo de persona. Ella vende sus costuras a los vecinos de la comunidad, quienes se muestran muy satisfechos por la calidad.
Actualmente Maria Isabel está solicitando un microcrédito de₡600.000 (seiscientos mil colones), para la compra de una máquina de coser.
Con esta inversión espera que su microempresa crezca más, para poder atender a mas clientes y ofrecerles mejores prendas. Todo esto ayudara a mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
Doña Maria Isabel es socia de la Empresa Comunal de Mujeres al Éxito de la Trinchera de Pital, una de las 110 organizaciones socias de EDESA en Costa Rica. Este será su segundo préstamo y con el espera continuar creciendo a nivel personal y económico, además de participar activamente en la organización de crédito en su comunidad.
texts.en:
Maria Isabel is a 38 year old woman who lives with her husband and three children (12,16, and 19 years old) in a small community called Trinchera de Pital, located in the Alajuela province.  The main economic activities in the area are livestock and agriculture, especially cultivation of pineapples, which are mainly sold internationally.  For this reason, community development has grown in the last few years, generating a larger demand for products and services, and providing people with more opportunities for work.

She works making clothes for all types of people.  She sells her sewing to her neighbors in the community, who are satisfied with the quality.  

Currently, Maria Isabel is asking for a loan of 600,000 colones to purchase a sewing machine.  With this investment, she hopes her small business will grow, so that she can serve more customers and offer them better clothing items.  All of this will help her improve the quality of her life.

Maria Isabel is a member of the community bank Mujeres al  Éxito [Women for Success] in Trinchera de Pital, one of the 110 member organizations of EDESA in Costa Rica.  This will be her second loan, and with it she hopes she can continue growing personally and financially, as well as participate actively in organizing loans in her community.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine.

loans.name: Lesbia Teresa

texts.es:
Doña Lesbia, habita en la ciudad de León, es madre de tres hijos, ella tiene 46 años de edad, es dueña de una pulpería. El ser comerciante es un oficio que aprendió desde muy joven, pues antes se dedicaba a vender ropa, zapatos, cosméticos lo hacia de manera ambulante , a la edad de 35 años decidió poner su negocio de pulpería y lleva 10 años con este negocio , su esposo aporta en el hogar con lo que le genera el taller de reparación de bicicletas del cual el es dueño. La visión de doña Lesbia es que su pulpería se convierta en una distribuidora de productos alimenticios.
Requiere el préstamo para  comprar arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, huevo, gaseosas y productos de limpieza. Con esta inversión podrá satisfacer parte de la demanda de sus clientes mantener surtida su venta de mercadería, mejorar sus ventas. Sus próximas metas es comprar un freezer, 2 vitrinas para llenarla de productos nuevos así atraer mas clientes e ir mejorando su nivel de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Lesbia lives in the city of León.  She is 46 years old and the mother of three children.  She owns a grocery store.  Being a saleswoman is a trade that Lesbia learned when she was very young as she used to sell clothes, shoes and cosmetics as an itinerant vendor.  At the age of 35, she decided to set up her grocery store and she has been in this business for ten years now.  Her husband contributes towards the household budget with what he makes from a bicycle repair shop that he owns.  Lesbia's vision is to turn her grocery store into a wholesale store.

Lesbia needs this loan to buy rice, beans, sugar, oil, eggs, soda and cleaning products.  This investment will enable her to satisfy some of her customer demand, keep her store stocked with merchandise and improve her sales.  Her next goals are to buy a freezer, to buy two display cabinets to fill with new products in order to attract more customers, and to improve her own quality of life as well as that of her family.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, sugar, oil, eggs, soda and cleaning products

loans.name: Los Garcias Group

texts.es:
El grupo los García lo conforman tres personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas es la señora Mayra del Carmen de 27 años quien vende ropa desde hace 10 años. Este negocio lo inicio con la ayuda de su marido y con los préstamos lo ha ido mejorando.
Ella con el crédito compara mercadería en ropa como camisas, pantalones, chores…etc.
Los otros integrantes son Juan Rafael de 32 años quien desde hace 15 años se dedica a la artesanía de canastos y  Manuel de 48 años quien es maestro y vende ropa, camisas y pantalones.
texts.en:
The 'Los García' group is made up of three hard-working and entrepreneurial people.  One of them is 27 year-old Mayra del Carmen who has been selling clothes for ten years.  She started her business with her husband's help and, with loans, she has gradually improved the business.  She will use this loan to buy merchandise such as shirts, pants, shorts, etc.

The other members of the group are 32 year-old Juan Rafael, who has been crafting baskets for 15 years, and 48 year-old Manuel who is a teacher and also sells clothes, shirts and pants.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as shirts, pants, shorts, etc.

loans.name: Eufemia

texts.en:
Eufemia is 42 years old and married. Her two children are 4 and 8 years old. She is a professor at a local university in Cusco. 

Eufemia is asking for a loan in order to invest in her husband's carpentry business. She plans to purchase tools such as levels and saws. She and her husband wish to improve his carpentry business and make it very successful. Eufemia is committed to making all of the necessary loan payments on time.

loans.use: to invest in her husband's carpentry business.

loans.name: Rosalia

texts.es:
Resalía tiene 70  años D. edad, ella es casada, no tiene hijos dependientes, cuenta con casa propia localizada en una zona urbana marginal D. Lambayeque, Rosalía cuenta con servicios D. agua y luz, el lugar es una comunidad pequeña con un aproximado D. 200  familias.

Resalía cuenta con unn espacio muy amplio en su domicilio el cual utiliza  D. cochera brindando un servicio D. resguardo D. vehículos: Moto taxis y y  autos, cobrando por ello D. forma diaria, el lugar donD. realiza esta actividad es  muy amplio y tiene espacio disponible para 28 vehículos aproximadamente.

Resalía esta solicitando un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa D. 1000 nuevos soles, para que  con este dinero ella pueda invertir en la puesta D. techo y columnas (calamina y parantes) para el resguardo y una mayor seguridad tanto para ella como los vehículos, además percibe  ingresos adicionales producto del alquiler D. cuartos.

Resalía es una mujer bastante trabajadora y que se esfuerza a diario por salir adelante y tener una mejor calidad D. vida. Las personas que le conocen le consideran una mujer amable y siempre dispuesta a ayudar a los demás.
texts.en:
Rosalía, age 70, is married and has no dependent children.  She has her own house in a marginal urban area of Lambayeque.  Rosalía has water and electrical services.  It is a small community with approximately 200 families.

Rosalía has quite a large space at her home that she uses as a garage providing vehicle protection service for “moto taxis” (three wheeled motorized vehicles) and cars.  She charges daily.  The place where she provides this service is very large.  She has approximately 28 spaces available.

Rosalía is requesting a loan for 1,000 soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  With this money she will be able to invest in placing a roof and columns (corrugated iron and wood).  She will do this for protection and greater security as much for herself as for the vehicles.  She also gets additional income from renting rooms.

Rosalía is a hard-worker who endeavors every day to get ahead and to have a better quality of life.  The people who know her consider her to be a kind woman who is always ready to help others.

loans.use: to place a roof and columns at her garage.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn, chicken, sugar and herbs and spices for making her tamales and atol

loans.name: María Esthela

texts.es:
La Señora. María es socia del banco comunal Prod Natura, vive por el sector de Miraflores en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad en 1999 fue nombrada Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, cuenta con hermosos lugares para visitar, tiene varios platos típicos, su gente es muy amable y cordial.
 
Doña María tiene 37 años, es divorciada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 4 hijos de 19, 17, 15 y 12 años de edad, todos sus hijos estudian en un colegio de la ciudad. No tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.
 
La Señora María se dedica a la venta de productos naturales de la marca TIENS (vitaminas, adelgazantes, suplementos nutricionales, productos de belleza, etc.), este producto lo vende hace 2 años, trabaja de domingo a domingo sin un horario fijo.
 
Es socia del banco comunal hace un año y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de productos naturales para surtir y crecer en este negocio.
 
Su meta es continuar con la venta de este producto y engrandecer más el negocio.
texts.en:
Señora María is a member of the communal bank Prod Natura.  She lives in the Miraflores neighborhood in the city of Cuenca.  This city was named a Cultural Heritage of Humanity in 1999.  It has beautiful places to visit, many traditional dishes and its people are very warm and friendly.  
 
Doña María is 37 years old, divorced and remarried.  She has 4 children ages 19, 17, 15 and 12.  All her children attend school in the city.  She rents because she does not own her own home.  

Señora María sells Tiens Natural Products (vitamins, weight loss products, nutritional supplements, beauty products, etc) for a living.  She has been selling these for 2 years.  She works 7 days a week and doesn't have a fixed schedule.  
 
She has been a member of the communal bank for one year.  She will use this new loan to purchase natural products to stock and grow her business.  

Her goal is to continue selling these products and expand her business.

loans.use: purchase vitamins, weight loss products, nutritional supplements, beauty products, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fertilizers.

loans.name: Ana Hilda

texts.es:
Ana, es una señora de 45 años de edad, tiene dos hijos de 13 y 15 años de edad, es madre soltera y vive en compañía de su padre, ella trabaja en loza fabricando comales y ollas, este negocio surge por la necesidad de proveer ingresos para su hogar.
Ella inicia sus labores de 8:00am a 4:00pm, aprendió esta actividad por su madre, actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de leña, barro, nacazcol y pago de transporte para la producción.
Este préstamo le será muy útil, pues contara con materiales para continuar fabricando los utensilios de barro, su objetivo es permanecer su fuente de ingreso y ayudar a sus hijos para que se eduquen y puedan tener mejores oportunidades de empleo, así también quiere crecer en el negocio y comercializar sus productos en los diferentes mercados.
texts.en:
Ana is 45 years old and has two children who are 13 and 15 years old.  She is a single mother, and lives with her father.  She works making pottery, such as griddles and pots.  She started this business because she needed to earn an income for her household.  She works from 8:00am to 4:00pm.  She learned how to make pottery from her mother.  

She is asking for this loan to purchase wood, mud, nacazcol seeds, and pay for transportation of her products.  This loan will be very useful because while she has materials to continue making clay utensils, her goal is to make her source of income stable.  She wants to help her children get an education so they can have better job opportunities.  She wants to grow her business and sell her products in different markets.

loans.use: to purchase wood, mud, nacazcol seeds, and pay for transportation of her products.

loans.name: Walter

texts.en:
Walter is 30 years old and single. He has his own carpentry business, specializing in metal. He has been doing this sort of work for about 4 years. 

Walter is asking for a 1,000 dollar loan in order to buy more materials for his business. Specifically, he plans to purchase more machinery and bricks. Walter enjoys his line of work and greatly desires to improve his business. He is committed to making all of the necessary loan payments on time.

loans.use: to buy machinery and bricks for his carpentry business.

loans.name: María Elvira

texts.es:
La Señora María es socia del banco comunal Prod Natura, vive por la parroquia de la Victoria del Portete, este  lugar es de clima frió, su gente se dedica a la ganadería, agricultura, muchos laboran en la ciudad de Cuenca en diferentes áreas de trabajo.
 
Doña María tiene 48 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 8 hijos de los cuales 3 son casados e independientes, 3 estudian uno en colegio y dos en la escuela y 2 de hijos ayudan en el trabajo de la casa. Su esposo trabaja como albañil, la casa en la que habitan es de su propiedad siendo el esfuerzo y trabajo conyugal.
 
La Señora María se dedica a la venta de productos naturales de la marca TIENS (vitaminas, adelgazantes, suplementos nutricionales, productos de belleza, etc.), este  trabajo lo  realiza hace 4 años, vende sus productos de domingo a domingo sin un horario fijo. 

Se encuentra en su segundo crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir de productos naturales para ampliar su negocio.
 
Su meta es crecer en su negocio.
texts.en:
María is a member of the Prod Natura community bank. She lives in the parrish of Victoria del Portete. This place has cold weather. Its people are dedicated to livestock and farming. Many work in the city of Cuenca in different areas of work.

María is 48 years old. She is married and her married union has resulted in eight children of whom three are married adults, three are college students and two are in school and help her with the housework. Her husband works as a bricklayer. The house that they live in is her property, the result of effort and work.

María is dedicated to selling TIENS brandname, natural products (vitamins, slimming products, nutritional supplements, beauty products, etc.) She has done this work for four years. She sells her products from Sunday to Sunday without fixed hours.

This is her second loan with the community bank and her new loan will be invested in natural products to expand her business. Her goal is to grow her business.

loans.use: to purchase natural products like vitamins, slimming  products, nutritional supplements, beauty products, etc.

loans.name: Leidy Graciela

texts.es:
Leidy de 20 años de edad, vive con su esposo e hijo en su casa propia, no cuenta con servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande que pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Esta zona se caracteriza por ser  agrícola, ganadera y artesana.

Desde algunos años Leidy se dedica a la comercialización de ganado ovino (ovejas) y aves de corral (gallinas y pavos), los cría en los corrales que tiene en la parte posterior de su casa, los alimenta con comida balanceada y granos naturales, una vez que hayan completado su crecimiento, los vende a sus clientes o en los diferentes mercados de la zona  y con los ingresos podrá cubrir sus necesidades de su casa.  

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para comprar de alimentos balanceados y de granos naturales, para que engorden y poderlos ofertar a un mejor precio a sus clientes, con las ganancias pagará el crédito otorgado y mejorará el nivel de vida de su familia.  Leidy con su vitalidad, trabajo y empeño a logrado salir adelante poco a poco junto con su familia y poderle dar mejores oportunidades académicas a su hijo.
texts.en:
Leidy, age 20, lives with her husband and child in their own house.  They do not have the basic services.  They live in the rural zone in the Tambogrande district, Piura department.  This zone is known for its agriculture, livestock, and handicrafts.

For some years Leidy has been selling sheep and poultry (chickens and ducks).  She raises them in corrals in her backyard.  She feeds them balanced feed and natural grains.  Once they have grown she sells them to her customers or at different markets in the zone.  With the income she is able to cover the household expenses.  

She has requested a loan for 1,000 soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy balanced feed and natural grains.  She will use these to fatten the animals and to be able sell them for a better price.  With the income she will pay for the loan and improve her family’s standard of living.

With her vitality, work, and determination, Leidy has been able to get ahead with her family little by little.  Also she is able to give her son better educational opportunities.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed and natural grains for her animals.

loans.name: Vida Y Esperanza Group

texts.es:
El grupo Vida y Esperanza está integrado por tres personas trabajadoras y esforzadas originarias de Nindiri. La coordinadora del grupo es la señora Rosa Amanda quien comercializa productos lácteos (leche, cuajada, queso, crema…etc.) desde hace nueve años y tiene una venta aproximada de 4,200 cordobas semanal. Ella tiene cuatro hijos de 21, 19,17 y 12 los cuales estudian.

Las otras integrantes son Martha Francisca comerciante de cosméticos y Sofía  vende tortillas desde hace 5 años ella vende semanalmente 2,100 cordobas y con el crédito comprará maíz, leña, cal…etc.
texts.en:
The Vida y Esperanza group has three members, all hard-working, determine women from Nindiri.  The group coordinator is Sra. Rosa Amanda who has operated a business selling dairy products (milk, curd, cheese, cream, etc.) for nine years.  Her weekly sales come to something around 4,200 cordobas.  She has four children, 21-, 19-, 17-, and 12-years old, all in school.

The other members of the group are Martha Francisca, who sells cosmetics and Sofia, who has made a living selling tortillas for 5 years.  Sofia's weekly sales come to 2,100 cordobas and she will use her share of the loan to buy maize, firewood, etc.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her dairy business.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.es:
(Quillabamba es la ciudad capital de Provincia de La Convención e importante centro de comercio de las valles de Lares y La Convención, las actividades principales son la producción de coca, café, cacao y frutales).
En la ciudad de Quillabamba visitamos al banco comunal “Los Corazones Valientes de Morro San Juan” y conocimos a la socia Teresa y nos cuenta: 

 “Nací en la ciudad de Quillabamba, tengo 49 años edad, tengo dos hijos y vivo en la misma ciudad donde nací y mi actividad principal es la venta de comida”. 

Teresa es madre y padre para sus hijos, ella es una mujer luchadora y emprendedora que a pesar de las adversidades trabaja para sacar adelante a sus hijos. Ella vende de forma ambulatoria desde las 6 de la mañana y hasta de las 6 de la noche. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo arroz, azúcar y otras cosas.
texts.en:
(Quillabamba is the capital of La Convencion province and an important commercial center for the Lares and La Convencion valleys.  The main source of income is farming, growing coca, coffee, cacao and fruit.)  
We visited the Los Corazones Valientes de Morro San Juan community bank in Quillabamba and met Teresa, one of the group's members:

"I was born in Quillabamba, I'm 49 years old, I have two children, I live in the city where I was born and I operate a food catering business."

Teresa is mother and father to her children.  She's a determined and enterprising women who has worked to support her children despite all the obstacles she's faced.  She works as a street vendor from 6 in the morning to 6 at night.  She will use this loan to buy supplies--rice and sugar, for example--for her business.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her food catering business.

loans.name: Pedro Pablo

texts.es:
Pedro, vive con su familia conformada por su esposa y 6 hijos de 19, 14, 12, 10, 8 y 4 años de edad, Pedro se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, aprendió hace 35 años, su padre se lo enseño desde muy joven, su horario de trabajo es de 6:00am a 11:00am.
Actualmente él, comprara insumos para sembrar maíz de postrera, que es la segunda siembra en el año, para esto solicita un préstamo para invertirlo en fertilizantes y herbicidas, que son muy necesarios para tratar a tiempo cualquier plaga.
Esta compra le ayudara para iniciar correctamente todo el proceso de la siembra, que al final pueda darle una abundante cosecha para comercializar y consumir con su familia estos frutos.
texts.en:
Pedro lives with his wife and 6 children--19-, 14-, 12-, 10-, 8- and 4-years old.  He operates a farm where he grows maize and beans, work that he's been doing for 35 years.  His father taught him to farm when he was a boy and he works from 6:00am to 11:00am.  
Pedro needs supplies to plant a new maize crop, his second and last crop of the year.  He is applying for a loan to buy fertilizers and herbicides, supplies that he has to have to get a good yield.  
The supplies will help him kick off the growing process correctly so that he'll have a good crop to harvest for sale and so that he and his family can enjoy the fruits of his labor.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and herbicides for his farming business.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “PUNTUALITO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Antonio; el tiene 42 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de restaurant y también el socio trabaja en el aeropuerto como operador de turismo y el negocio de restaurant lo realiza su esposa, el socio trabaja desde las 5:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,por medio de este el socio y su esposa sacan adelante a sus hijos, el socio quiere ampliar el negocio de restaurant y mejorar en el trabajo como operador de turismo. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para el restaurant como arroz, azúcar, fideos, aceite y leche al por mayor para implementar el restaurant.
                                               
El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Antonio is a member of the “PUNTUALITO” communal bank, located in the Cusco district, province, and department.

He is 42 years old, is in a live in relationship, and has three children.  Antonio has a restaurant and also works as a tour operator at the airport.  His wife runs the restaurant.  He works from 5:00am to 7:00pm and together he and his wife help move their children ahead in life.   He would like to expand his restaurant business and improve his tour operator business.  He is asking for this loan in order to buy supplies, such as rice, sugar, noodles, cooking oil, and milk in bulk for the restaurant.

He is happy about this loan and is committed to repaying it.

loans.use: to buy supplies for his restaurant.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan Carlos, de 34 años de edad, habita en la Ciudad de León, el es padre de 3 hijos todos adolecentes, su esposa es ama de casa, el es joyero de oficio, el cual aprendió gracias a su padre que desde muy joven le enseño a trabajar en este negocio. El lleva 10 años trabajando de forma independiente, el tiene su  pequeño y humilde local en el mercado de la estación de buses de León, atravez de este negocio es que ha logrado mantener a su familia pues es el único sostiene su hogar.    
Solicito el préstamo para compra materia prima como 70 gramos de oro y 150 gramos de plata para elaborar sus joyas. Pues con esta inversión pretende tener materia prima para cumplir con los pedidos y variar sus diseños. El desea seguir con sus negocio haciéndolo prosperar, quiere sembrar en unas tierras que su padre le heredo. En sus metas esta el comprar estantes de vidrio y metal para exhibir sus diseños y darle una mejor apariencia a su negocio y poder expandirse a lo largo de la ciudad.
texts.en:
Juan Carlos is 34 years old and lives in the city of León.  He is the father of three teenage children.  HIs wife is a housewife and he is a jeweler by trade.  This is a profession that Juan Carlos learned thanks to his father who taught him to work in this business when he was very young.  He has been working independently for ten years now.  Juan Carlos owns small and humble premises in the market at León bus station.  Through this business, he has managed to support his family.  He is the only one who supports his household.

Juan Carlos requested this loan to buy raw materials (70 grams of gold and 150 grams of silver) to make his jewelry.  With this investment, he plans to have the raw materials he needs available so that he can fill his orders and vary his designs.  He would like to continue in his business and make it prosper.  He would also like to sow some land that his father left him.  His goals include buying glass and metal shelves on which to display his designs, improving the appearance of his business and being able to expand throughout the city.

loans.use: to buy raw materials (70 grams of gold and 150 grams of silver) to make his jewelry

loans.name: Fatima Del Rosario

texts.es: La señora  Fátima, es habitante del municipio de Masaya, junto a su esposo e hijos, los planes hacia su familia es mejorar las condiciones de vida, desde hace varios años se dedica a trabajos campos, especialmente al cultivo de yuca, la mayor afectación  que se le presenta es que no cuenta con un capital suficiente para poder realizar la inversión y sobre todo el mantenimiento que requiere, el préstamo lo va a invertir en la compra de madera de yuca, arado, fertilizantes, etc. Agradece el apoyo que le brinda Afodenic  atrávez de fonda Kiva ya que sin estos programas no fuese posible la inversión ya que estos fondos se obtienen muchos beneficios por sus intereses bajos.
texts.en:
Fátima lives in the town of Masaya together with her husband and children.  Her plans for her family are to improve their living conditions.  Fátima has been farming for several years.  In particular, she grows cassava.  The biggest problem that she faces is that she doesn't have enough capital to be able to invest in her business and provide her crops with the care they need.

Fátima will invest this loan in buying tree cassava, a plow, fertilizers, etc.  She is grateful for the support that Afodenic are providing through their Kiva fund as, without these programs, it wouldn't be possible for her to make this investment as these funds provide a lot of benefits as a result of their low interest rates.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and supplies

loans.name: Danila

texts.en:
Danila is 49 years old and the single mother of two children. Her children are 16 and 24 years old. They currently still live with her while they attend school. 

Danila sells leather products, on the street, such as purses, small bags, and coin purses. She works everyday selling her merchandise in all parts of the city of Cusco. Danila greatly desires to add to the variety of products she sells. She is asking for a 300 dollar loan in order to purchase a wider variety of leather products to sell. She is committed to making all of the necessary loan payments on time.

loans.use: to buy more leather products to sell.

loans.name: Elvia María

texts.es:
La Señora. Elvia es socia del banco comunal Prod Natura, vive por la parroquia de  Santa Ana, este lugar es de clima frió, su gente se dedica a la ganadería, agricultura, muchos laboran en la ciudad de Cuenca en diferentes áreas de trabajo.
 
Doña Elvia tiene 49 años, es casada y su esposo labora como guardia de seguridad, no tiene hijos, la casa en la que habitan es de su propiedad. 

Nuestra socia hace un año se dedica a la venta de productos naturales de la marca TIENS (vitaminas, adelgazantes, suplementos nutricionales, productos de belleza, etc.). También trabaja cocinando de lunes a viernes.
 
Este es su primer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal al cual fue invitada por una amiga. El dinero de su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de productos naturales para incrementar su negocio.
 
Su meta es crecer en su negocio.
texts.en:
Elvia is a member of the Prod Natura community bank. She lives in the parrish of Santa Ana. This place has cold weather. Its people are dedicated to livestock and farming. Many work in the city of Cuenca in different areas of work.

Elvia is 49 years old, is married and her husband works as a security guard. She does not have children. The house in which they live is their property.

Our member has been dedicated to selling TIENS brandname natural products (vitamins, slimming products, nutritional supplements, beauty products, etc.) for one year. She also works as a cook from Monday to Friday.

This is her first loan with the community bank, to which she was invited by a friend. The money from the loan will be invested in the purchase of natural products to increase the business. Her goal is to grow the business.

loans.use: to purchase natural products like vitamins, slimming products, nutritional supplements, beauty products, etc.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “PUNTUALITO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Martha; ella tiene 39 años de edad y es casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes y también tiene una combi que hace servicio urbano en las diferentes calles de la ciudad de Cusco y el negocio de tienda de abarrotes lo realiza desde las 5:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m,ella vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz,azúcar,fideos,aceite,galletas entre otros productos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes y mejorar el negocio de transporte. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, fideos y leche al por mayor para la tienda de abarrotes.
 
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Martha is a member of the “PUNTUALITO” communal bank, located in the Cusco district, province, and department.

She is 39 years old, is married, and has three children.  Martha has a grocery store and also a van that she uses to provide transportation service along different streets in Cusco.  She works her grocery store business from 5:00am to 10:00pm, and sells primary needs products, such as rice, sugar, noodles, cooking oil, and cookies, among other things.  She wants to expand her business and improve the service in her store, as well as her transportation business.   She is asking for this loan in order to buy primary needs products for her grocery store.

She is happy about this loan and is committed to repaying it.

loans.use: to buy products for her grocery store.

loans.name: Dolores Isabel

texts.es:
Dolores, vive con su esposo y tres hijos D. 17, 15 y 12 años D. edad, ella se dedica a la fabricación D. totillas desD. hace 11 años, este oficio se lo heredo su madre, D. este negocio ha logrado mantener a sus hijos.
Ella solicita un préstamo pues necesita invertirlo en maíz y leña, para abastecerse y tener la posibilidad D. aumentar la producción, este préstamo ayudara grandemente a la economía D. Dolores, pues la compra la hará por mayoreo, obteniendo a mejor precio el maíz.
Su objetivo es dedicarse al negocio, contar con financiamientos que le permitan crecer y D. igual manera ayudar a sus hijos en la educación y alimentación.
texts.en:
Dolores lives with her husband and three children, ages 17, 15, and 12.  She’s been making tortillas for the past 11 years; a traD. that she learned from her mother.  This business has allowed her to support her children.

She is asking for this loan so she can buy corn and firewood in order to stock her business and have a chance to increase her production.  This loan will be of great help to Dolores’ finances and will allow her to buy corn in bulk at better prices.

Her goal is to dedicate herself to her business, use the financing to help her grow, and in the same manner help feed her children and pay for their education.

loans.use: to buy corn and firewood.

loans.name: Alberto

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “PUNTUALITO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Alberto; el tiene 42 años de edad y es casado y tiene 6 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de turismo, el tiene un local donde da información turística, el socio trabaja desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, el trabaja con turistas nacionales e internacionales, por medio de este negocio de turismo el socio saca adelante a sus hijos, el socio quiere ampliar el negocio de turismo. El  socio solicita el préstamo para pagar las mensualidades de la educación de sus hijos que están en el colegio.
                                               
El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Alberto is a member of the "PUNTUALITO" communal bank, located in the district, province, and department of Cusco.

He is 42 years old, married, and has 6 children.  He has a tourist information business where he works from 9:00am to 7:00pm; working with national and foreign tourists.  This business has allowed him to get his children ahead and he would like to expand it.  He is asking for this loan so that he can pay for his children's tuition.

Alberto is happy about this loan and committed to making his payments.

loans.use: to pay for his children's tuition.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Emma Rina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “PUNTUALITO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Emma Rina; ella tiene 52 años de edad y es casada y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de manualidades, ella hace trabajos en tela, lana y tejidos y también hace manteles y pisos y lo vende en forma independiente y también la socia es cesante del nivel de educación, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de manualidades. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales para hacer las manualidades como lana, hilos y crochés.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Emma Rina is a member of the “PUNTUALITO” communal bank, located in the district, province, and department of Cusco.

She is 52 years old, is married, and has four children.  She does arts and crafts with fabric, yarn, knitting and also makes tablecloths and mats and sells them on her own.  She is also a retired teacher.  Emma Rina would like to expand her craft business and is asking for this loan in order to buy supplies such as yarn, thread, and crochets.

She is very happy about the loan and is committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to buy craft supplies

loans.name: Magda Margot

texts.es:
(Quillabamba es la ciudad capital de Provincia de La Convención e importante centro de comercio de las valles de Lares y La Convención, las actividades principales son la producción de coca, café, cacao y frutales).
En la ciudad de Quillabamba visitamos al banco comunal “Los Corazones Valientes de Morro San Juan” y conocimos a la socia Margot y nos cuenta: 

 “Nací en la ciudad de Quillabamba, tengo 26 años edad, tengo un hijo y vivo en la misma ciudad donde nací y mi actividad principal es la crianza de animales menores”. 

Margot es una mujer luchadora y emprendedora que a pesar de las adversidades trabaja en la crianza de animales menores como por ejemplo pollos, ella compra pollitos y los alimenta con nutrientes y suplementos después de hacerlo engordar los vende en la ciudad de Quillabamba. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar alimento para los pollos.
texts.en:
Quillabamba is the capital city of the province of La Convención. It is an important commercial center of the Lares and La Convención valleys. The main activities there are the production of coca, coffee, cacao and fruit.   

In the city of Quillabamba we visit the “Los Corazones Valientes de Morro San Juan” [Brave Hearts of Morro San Juan] community bank and we meet a member named Margot. She tells us the following:  

 “I was born in the city of Quillabamba. I am 26 years old, I have a son and I live in the same city where I was born. My main activity is raising small animals”. 

Margot is a fighter and an enterprising woman. Despite adversity, she raises small animals such as chickens. She feed them with nutrients and supplements. After fattening them up, she sells them in the city of Quillabamba. At this time, she needs the loan to buy feed for the chickens.

loans.use: to buy feed for chickens.

loans.name: Maria Del Pilar

texts.es:
Maria del Pilar tiene 34 años de edad, ella es casada con 02 hijos a su cargo. Vive en casa propia la  cual está ubicada en el Caserío Las Mónicas  en el distrito de Tambogrande, esta es una zona rural del distrito pero solo cuenta con servicio de energía eléctrica.

Maria del Pilar se dedica a la preparación y venta de comida en el paradero de un caserío cercano a su comunidad, ella atiende todos los días y tiene varios años de experiencia en el negocio, por lo que cuenta con clientela ya establecida en la zona. Adicionalmente María del  pilar tiene una bodega instalada en su vivienda la misma que es atendida por su hija cuando ella no se  encuentra. 

María del Pilar esta solicitando un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para que ella pueda comprar mas insumos para la preparación de sus comidas, de esta manera María del Pilar podrá preparar comida en una mayor cantidad y abastecer a un mayor numero de clientes. Ella también espera comprar mas mercadería para su bodega, como productos de primera necesidad o de uso domestico, que son los de mayor rotación en su zona   

María del Pilar a demostrado ser una persona muy puntual y responsable, ella es una mujer trabajadora que desea poder ayudar a su esposo y de esta manera logar que su familia alcance una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María del Pilar, 34, is married and has two children in her care.  She lives in her own house located in Caserío Las Mónicas in Tambogrande District.  This is the rural part of the district so the only utility she has is electricity.

María del Pilar prepares food to sell at the bus stop in a neighboring hamlet.  She works every day and has several years experience in this business so she has an established base of regular local customers.  In addition, María also has a home-based grocery store that her daughter tends to when she’s not home.

María del Pilar is asking Edpyme Alternativa for a 2000 new sol loan so that she can buy more ingredients needed to prepare her food so that she can make larger amounts and sell to a larger number of customers.  She also hopes to buy more merchandise for her store like basic need or domestic use items which are the best sellers in her area.

María del Pilar has shown herself to be a very punctual and responsible person.  She is a very hard working woman who wants to help her husband and so that they can lead their family to a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to prepare her food and to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Diana Del Socorro

texts.es:
Diana de 38 años de edad, vive con su esposo e hijos en su casa propia, no cuenta con servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande que pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Esta zona se caracteriza por ser  agrícola, ganadera y artesana.

Desde hace algunos años Diana se dedica a la comercialización de ganado ovino (ovejas) y aves de corral (gallinas y pavos), los cría en corrales amplios que tiene en la parte posterior de su casa, los alimenta con comida balanceada y granos naturales, una vez que hayan completado su crecimiento, los vende a sus clientes o en los diferentes mercados de la zona  y con los ingresos podrá cubrir sus necesidades y obligaciones de su casa.   También tiene tierras de cultivo donde siembra de limón,una vez que cosecha lo comercializa.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 500 nuevos soles para comprar de alimentos balanceados y de fertilizantes para mejorar sus tierras de cultivo, con las ganancias que obtenga por la venta de sus aves como de su limón pagará su crédito otorgado y mejorará el nivel de vida de su familia.  Diana con su responsabilidad y empeño está logrando que su familia salga adelante, con la finalidad que sus hijos tengan otras oportunidades en un futuro.
texts.en:
Diana, 38, lives with her husband and children in her own house; it does not have basic utilities yet and is located in Tambogrande District which belongs to Piura Department.  This area is noted for farming, livestock raising and crafts making.

For a few years now Diana has been selling ovine livestock (sheep) and barnyard fowl (chickens and turkeys).  She raises them in spacious corrals she has in her back yard.  She feeds them nutritionally balanced feed and natural grains.  Once they complete their growth she sells them to her customers or in various local markets and uses income from the sales to cover her household needs and commitments.  She also has farmland where she grows lemons that are sold when harvested

She has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 500 new sol loan to buy nutritionally balanced feed and fertilizer to improve her farmland.  She will use profits from her fowl and from her lemon sales to repay the granted loan and to improve her family’s standard of living.  Through her hard work and dedication Diana has managed to move her family forward her only goal being that her children have other opportunities in the future.

loans.use: to buy nutritionally balanced feed and to buy fertilizers to improve her fields.

loans.name: Julyssa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “PUNTUALITO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Julyssa; ella tiene 28 años de edad y es soltera; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de ropa, ella vende pantalones, chompas, casacas, polos entre otros tipos de ropa y la socia también trabaja en una farmacia desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de ropa. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar ropa al por mayor como polos, chompas, pantalones y gorros.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the “PUNTUALITO” community bank.  The bank is located in the district of Cuzco, which belongs to the province and department of Cuzco. 

The member's name is Julyssa. She is 28 years old and single. She buys and sells clothes. She sells pants, sweaters, jackets, and polo shirts, among other types of clothing. She also works in a pharmacy from 9:00 a.m. til 10:00 p.m. Julyssa wants to grow her clothes selling business. She is asking for the loan to buy clothes such as polo shirts, sweaters, pants and hats wholesale.    

Julyssa is happy with the loan and committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to buy clothes such as polo shirts, sweaters, pants and hats wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy pigs and supplies for her pig farm.

loans.name: Vilma

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “PUNTUALITO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Vilma; ella tiene 55 años de edad y es soltera y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de horno panificadora, ella vende panes, galletas y tortas, la socia trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 8:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de horno panificadora. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar insumos para preparar los panes, tortas y galletas como harina, azúcar, manteca y huevos al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Vilma belongs to the Puntualito Communal Bank.  The bank is in the Cusco district, Cusco province, Cusco department.

Vilma is 55 years old, single, and has three children.  She alternates her daily activities with her business of making bread.  She sells bread, cookies, and cakes.  She works from 6:00 a.m. until 8:00 p.m.  It is through this business that she gets her children ahead. 

She wants to expand and improve her bread making business.  She is requesting the loan to buy ingredients to make bread, cakes, and cookies.  She will buy wholesale ingredients like flour, sugar, shortening, and eggs.

She is happy about the loan, and she pledges to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy wholesale ingredients for making bread like flour, sugar, shortening, and eggs.

loans.name: Rojo Group

texts.es:
El grupo Rojo está conformado por cuatro personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras. La coordinadora es la señora Silvia quien tiene un pequeño negocio de recargas, alquiler y venta de teléfonos de las compañías de telefónica claro y movistar. En el negocio trabaja junto a su hermana y su meta es seguir aumentándolo. 
Los otros integrantes son Jairo hace cuatro años tiene un pequeño bar, Jaqueline vende calzado y Damariz de 49 años tiene una pequeña venta.
texts.en:
The Rojo group is comprised of four hard-working and enterprising people.

The coordinator is Silvia.  She has a small business selling rechargeable calling cards.  In her business she also rents and sells telephones from the Claro and Movistar companies.  She works in the business together with her sister.  Her goal is to continue expanding it.

The other members of the group are Jairo, who has had a small bar for four years, Jaqueline sells shoes, and 49 year old Damariz has a small sales business.

loans.use: to buy rechargeable cell phone cards, accessories, and cell phones.

loans.name: Jaime

texts.es:
Jaime tiene 35 años de edad, vive con su esposa e hijo en su casa propia, cuenta con sólo servicio de luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Zaña, que pertenece a la provincia de Chiclayo.  Esta zona la actividad que desarrollan es la agricultura, ganadería y turismo (cuenta con sitios arqueológicos).

Jaime desde hace algunos años se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado vacuno (vaca), su corral se encuentra en la parte externa de su casa, los alimenta con comida balanceada y pastos naturales para que tenga una buena producción de leche, la que ofrece a los mismos pobladores de la zona, cuenta con clientela fija por la buena calidad de leche que tiene, con sus ingresos solventa sus obligaciones familiares.  

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles la cual lo utilizara para la atención del parto de su esposa que se encuentra embaraza.  Jaime es un padre de familia responsable y trabajador que lo único que quiere es poderles ofrecer mejores oportunidades y comodidades en especial a sus hijos, algo que él no pudo tener.
texts.en:
Jaime is 35 years old. He lives with his wife and son in their own house. He only has electricity. They are located in a rural area in the district of Zaña, which belongs to the province of Chiclayo. In this area people work in agriculture, cattle raising, and tourism (there are archeological sites).

For several years, Jaime has worked in raising and selling cattle. His corral is located in his yard. He feeds them with commercial feed and natural grasses so that they will have good milk production. He offers the milk to the people who live in the area. He has a fixed client base because of the quality of his milk. With this income he is able to meet his obligations to his family.

He has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternative for PEN 1,000.00, which he will use to pay for birthing services for his wife, who is pregnant. Jaime is a responsible father and worker. All he wants is to be able to offer his family better opportunities and comforts that he wasn’t able to have, especially to his children.

loans.use: to pay for birthing services for his wife, who is pregnant.

loans.name: Ciro

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “PUNTUALITO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Ciro; el tiene 47 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de materiales de construcción, el vende cemento, arena y yeso, el socio trabaja desde las 5:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el socio quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de materiales de construcción. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales de construcción y también para comprar combustible para los carros que trasladan los materiales de construcción.
                                              
El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Ciro belongs to the Puntualito Communal Bank.  The bank is in the Cusco district, Cusco province, Cusco department.

Ciro is 47 years old, has a life partner, and has three children.  He alternates his daily activities with his business of buying and selling construction materials.  He sells cement, sand, and plaster.  He works from 5:00 a.m. until 6:00 p.m.  It is through this business that he gets his children ahead.  He wants to expand his business of selling construction materials.

He is requesting the loan to buy construction materials.  He will also buy fuel for the cars that transport the construction materials.

He is happy about the loan, and he pledges to make his payments on time.

loans.use: to buy construction materials and to buy fuel for the cars that transport the construction materials.

loans.name: Pedro Dimas

texts.es:
Pedro, vive con su esposa y dos hijos de 2 y 5 años de edad, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene 10 años de trabajar, aprendió el proceso de la agricultura por su padre, todos los días atiende las labores de 6:00am a 3:00pm.
Actualmente Pedro se encuentra sembrando la milpa y también frijoles, para ellos solicita un préstamo para comprar fertilizantes, dicho préstamo le ayudara a tener los insumos necesarios para tratar el cultivo, garantizándose la buena cosecha a través del buen cuido.
Para él ayudar a sus dos hijos es el objetivo que persigue cada día de trabajo, proveyendo para ellos lo necesario en alimentación, salud y educación.
texts.en:
Pedro lives with his wife and their two children, ages 2 and 5.  He grows corn and beans.  He has been working for ten years, and he learned the agricultural process from his father.  He attends to his work every day from 6:00 a.m. until 3:00 p.m.

Pedro is currently planting corn and beans.  He is requesting a loan to buy fertilizers for those crops.  The loan will help him have the necessary supplies to treat his crops.  This will guarantee a good harvest from the good care of the crops.

Helping his two children is the objective he pursues every work day.  He works to provide them with what they need in food, health, and education.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for his bean and corn crops.

loans.name: Janet Cristina

texts.es:
Janet  es una madre de familia de 28 años de edad, tiene 1 hija menor de edad, actualmente vive con su abuelo y su hija en la comunidad de Chapen, en el departamento de La Libertad departamento conocido por su sus costumbres y por el realce a la Marinera danza típica del Perú.

Janet se dedica a la venta de carnes rojas (carnes de res, de chancho, de cabrito, etc.) labor que desempeña en el mercado de su localidad en el cual tiene dos puestos propios,  Janet tiene ya más de 8 años de experiencia en el negocio y cuenta con buena clientela fidelizada en su negocio.

Janet esta solicitando un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 3000 nuevos soles para que con este dinero  pueda comprar más animales vivos, posteriormente los sacrificará para vender sus carnes.

Janet es una mujer trabajadora y entusiasta, que anteriormente demostró su puntualidad y responsabilidad, ya que su objetivo es seguir creciendo como empresaria y de esta manera poder brindarles una mejor calidad de vida asu hija y a su abuelo
texts.en:
Janet is a 28-year-old mother. She has one young daughter and currently lives with her grandmother and daughter in the Chapen community, in the La Libertad department. La Libertad is known for its customs and for what it has added to the traditional Peruvian Marinera dance.

Janet sells red meat (meat from cows, pigs, etc) in the local market where she has her own two stalls. Janet now has over 8 years' experience in this business and has a good, loyal customer base.

Janet is requesting a loan of 3000 soles from Edpyme Alternativa, with which she will purchase more live animals which she will slaughter to sell their meat.

Janet is a hard-working and enthusiastic woman, who has already demonstrated her punctuality and responsibility. Her goal is to continue growing as a businesswoman and to be able to offer a better quality of life to her daughter and grandmother.

loans.use: to purchase animals to later sell as meat.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al Banco Comunal “SEÑOR D. LOS MILAGROS D. CHIMPAHUAYLLA”; El banco pertenece al distrito D. Huanchac, Provincia D. Cusco, departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Isabel; la socia tiene 62 años; la socia es conviviente;  La socia tiene 1 hijo y ella se dedica a la administración y atención D. sus picantería en casa, la socia cocina y venD. chicha con fresas llamada frutillada, la socia trabaja en su misma casa con su negocio, ella implemento un espacio para ahorrarse los alquileres,  la socia desea el préstamo para invertir en la compra D. ingredientes, como arroz, papas, para elaborar los diferentes potajes, también D. sea invertir en la compra D. maíz y D. frutilla para la chicha y cerveza. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra D. ingredientes, cerveza.

La socia se muestra muy satisfecha y agradecida por el apoyo que se le brindara mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago D. sus deudas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Isabel belongs to the Señor D. los Milagros D. Chimpahuaylla Communal Bank.  The bank is in the Huanchac district, Cusco province, Cusco department.

Isabel is 62 years old, has a life partner, and has one child.  She manages and tends her restaurant at home.  She cooks and sells “chicha” (a corn based drink) with strawberries.  This is called “frutillada”.  She works with her business from her own house.  She set up a space at home in order to save paying rent.

She wants the loan to buy ingredients like rice and potatoes to make different stews.  She will also buy corn and strawberries for chicha and beer.

She is very satisfied and grateful for the support she’ll get and commits to pay her debts in a timely fashion.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and beer.

loans.name: Mery

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “PUNTUALITO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Mery; ella tiene 40 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de agencia de viajes, la socia vende boletos turísticos a los diferentes turistas nacionales e internacionales, la socia trabaja desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de agencias de viajes. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar boletos turísticos para viajar a machupicchu.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Mery is a member of the "Puntualito" community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.

Mery is 40 years old, lives with her partner, and has two children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her travel agency business.  She sells tourist tickets to domestic and foreign tourists.  She works from 9.00am to 7.00pm and, through this business, she gets her children ahead in life.  Mery would like to expand her travel agency business.  She is requesting this loan to buy tourist tickets for traveling to Machu Picchu.

Mery is happy to be receiving her loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy tourist tickets for traveling to Machu Picchu

loans.name: Maria Teresa

texts.es:
(Quillabamba es la ciudad capital de Provincia de La Convención e importante centro de comercio de las valles de Lares y La Convención, las actividades principales son la producción de coca, café, cacao y frutales).
En la ciudad de Quillabamba visitamos al banco comunal “Los Corazones Valientes de Morro San Juan” y conocimos a la socia Maria Teresa y nos cuenta: 

 “Nací en la ciudad de Quillabamba, tengo 24 años edad, soy madre soltera y tengo un hijo y vivo en la misma ciudad donde nací y mi actividad principal es la cosmetología”. 

Maria Teresa es una mujer luchadora y emprendedora que a pesar de las adversidades saca adelante a su hijo. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para uso personal ósea para la educación de su hija. El sueño María Teresa es abrir un salón de belleza.
texts.en:
Quillabamba is the capital of La Convención province and an important commercial center for the Lares and La Convención valleys.  The main business activities here are coca, coffee, cacao and fruit production.

In the town of Quillabamba we visit the "Los Corazones Valientes de Morro San Juan” community bank and meet María Teresa who tells us:

"I was born in the town of Quillabamba.  I am 24 years old and a single mother.  I have one child and live in the town in which I was born.  I work as a cosmetologist".

María Teresa is a hard-working and entrepreneurial woman who, in spite of life's adversities, manages to get her child ahead in life.  On this occasion, she needs a loan to pay for her daughter's education.  María Teresa's dream is to open a beauty salon.

loans.use: to pay for her daughter's education

loans.name: Maria Victoria

texts.es:
María, tiene 57 años de edad, vive en la Ceiba un vecindario ubicado en la ciudad de León, ella es madre de 5 hijos de los cuales 2 están a su cargo y tres son independientes, ella es comerciante , su nivel académico es básico solo curso hasta el sexto grado de primaria. El oficio de comerciante lo aprendió por medio de su madre ya que tenia un tramo en el mercado de venta de mercadería en general y ella ayudaba a su mama a vender, al cumplir 22 años comenzó a vender ropa ambulante y posteriormente puso un negocio de venta de comida y vender sopa en su casa.
Solicito el préstamo para comprar mercadería como ropa y zapatos para vender. Pues la visión que tiene de su negocio es tener una tienda de ropa y mercadería en su casa. Desea mejorar y expandir su negocio tener estantes donde poner su mercadería exhibirla con una mejor presentación y atraer mas clientes y tener estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
María is 57 years old and lives in La Ceiba, a neighborhood of the city of León.  She is the mother of five children, two of whom are still in her care and three of whom live independently.  She is a saleswoman.  She has a basic level of education, as she only studied up to the sixth year of elementary school.  She learned the sales trade from her mother since she used to have a stall in the market where she sold general merchandise and María helped her to sell her products.  When she reached the age of 22, María started selling clothes as an itinerant vendor and then she set up a business selling food and soup in her home.

María requested this loan to buy merchandise such as clothes and shoes to sell.  Her vision for her business is to have a store in her home where she sells clothes and merchandise.  She would like to improve and expand her business and have shelves where she can better display her merchandise and attract more customers.  She would like to enjoy better financial stability.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as clothes and shoes to sell

loans.name: Lourdes Mariela

texts.es:
La Señorita Lourdes es socia del banco comunal Josesito de Cumbe, vive por la parroquia de Cumbe, este lugar es de clima frió, tiene hermosos lugares para visitar y disfrutar de la naturaleza, su gente se dedica a la cría de animales, agricultura y muchos salen diariamente a laborar en la ciudad.

La Señorita. Lourdes tiene 21 años de edad, es soltera y vive con sus padres, su papá labora como albañil y su mamá labora en la agricultura. La casa en la que habitan es de su propiedad.
 
Nuestra socia se encuentra estudiando en la universidad está en segundo año, en su casa se dedica a la cría de animales como pollos y cuyes. Los fines de semana laboran en la atención de un bar trabajo en el que lleva 7 años.
 
Se encuentran en su cuarto crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y lo va a invertir para la compra de pollos y cuyes.

Su meta es crecer en la cría de animales y culminar sus estudios universitarios.
texts.en:
Lourdes is a member of the "Josesito de Cumbe" community bank.  She lives in Cumbe parish which has a cold climate and has beautiful places where people can enjoy being close to nature.  The locals raise animals, farm and many go to the city every day to work.  

Lourdes is 21 years old, single, and lives with her parents.  Her dad works as a builder and her mom farms.  They own their own home.
