Her dream is that she’ll be able to study a university career and attain a professional degree.  Another of her dreams is to go on vacation with the entire family to various places in the country.

Sandra is very happy with and grateful for the services obtained from Fondo Esperanza and stresses proudly the values that are instilled in the institution, like honesty and solidarity, to incorporate into the communal bank group.  She comments that she’s learned from the training sessions and is now generating strategies to innovate her business to acquire a larger number of customers.  In this way she plans to incorporate home-made jams and pastry items that she herself makes.

Chillán is a commune in south-central Chile.  Its name means “chair of the sun” in Mapudungun, the indigenous Mapuche language.  Chillán is known as the “Nation’s Cradle” or “Land of Artists” because many outstanding figures in Chile’s history were born here, like the well-known pianist, Claudio Arrau.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy pants, shirts, skirts, dresses, suits and cosmetics.

loans.name: Raul

texts.es: Raúl, tiene la edad de 51 años, está casada  y vive con sus 2 hijos y su  esposa que son su mayor prioridad. El pretende con el crédito realizar la compra de unos terneros para engorde. El cuenta con la experiencia necesaria para el cuido de los animales. El lo que hará es engordarlos y tenerlos a su poder durante un tiempo establecido para luego su posterior venta en el mercado local. El quiere incrementar el número de animales a su poder y así a la hora de la venta tener  mayores ganancias. El tiene como meta generar ganancias para su bienestar familiar y así tener un futuro asegurado en tiempo de alguna crisis.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Raúl, 51, is married and lives with his wife and two children who are his greatest priority.  He intends to use the loan to buy some calves to raise.  He has the necessary experience needed to care for these animals.  What he will do is fatten them up keeping them in his possession for the required time to later sell them in the local market.  He wants to increase his herd size so that when he sells them profits will be higher.  His goal is to generate profits for his family’s wellbeing so that the future will be secured against times of crisis.

This is his first FUDECOSUR loan.  He has had no prior loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR offered the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy livestock.

loans.name: Alejandra

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al Banco Comunal “SEÑOR DE LOS MILAGROS DE CHIMPAHUAYLLA”; El banco pertenece al distrito de Huanchac, Provincia de Cusco, departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Alejandra; la socia tiene 44 años; la socia es conviviente; La socia tiene 5 hijos y ella se dedica a la compra y venta de vinos, la socia reparte vinos a domicilio y tiendas, restaurantes, barres, según los pedidos que le hagan, la socia trabaja en este negocio desde hace más de 2 años, su conyugue trabaja en preventas de una conocida empresa de fideos, la socia desea invertir el préstamo en la compra de vinos al por mayor para repartir a sus clientes. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de vinos al por mayor.

La socia se muestra muy satisfecha y agradecida por el apoyo que se le brindara mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus deudas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Alejandra, 44, is a member of the “Señor de los Milagros de Chimpahuaylla” communal bank that belongs to Huanchac District in Cusco Province and Department.

She has a spouse and five children.  She is a wine merchant.  She delivers wine to stores, homes, restaurants and bars according to the orders she gets.  She’s been in this business for over two years.  Her husband works in presales for a well-known brand of noodles.  She wants to invest the loan to purchase wine at wholesale for improved delivery to her customers.  She is requesting the loan to buy wines at wholesale.

She is very satisfied with and grateful for the support provided her through this means and commits to pay her debts in a timely fashion.

loans.use: to buy wine at wholesale.

loans.name: Lesli Zulema

texts.es:
En la comunidad de Tambo Real de la provincia de Anta departamento del Cusco se hacen las reuniónes del banco comunal “Solidaridad Tambo Real” y en ese lugar conocimos a la socia Lesli y nos cuenta: 

“Nací en la comunidad de Tambo Real, tengo 21 años edad y vivo en la ciudad del Cusco y tengo varias actividad como por ejemplo, trabajo en una botica “FarmaGroup” y estudio la carrera técnica de Rehabilitación y Fisioterapia en el Instituto Superior Antonio Lorena de la ciudad del Cusco”. 

Lesli es técnico en Farmacia y es una joven profesional que es trabajadora y responsable que busca las mejores oportunidades para tener una mejor calidad de vida. Ella y su mamá Nancy tienen un negocio familiar que consiste   engorde de ganado. En esta oportunidad Lesli requiere el préstamo para comprar alimento para los animales y algunos animales.
texts.en:
The “Solidaridad Tambo Real” (Tambo Real Solidarity) communal bank meets in the community of Tambo Real in Anta Province, Cusco Department.  We met its member, Lesli, there and she comments:

“I was born in Tambo Grande.  I’m 21 years old and live in the city of Cusco.  I have several activities.  For example, I work in a FarmaGroup pharmacy and am studying Rehabilitation and Physiotherapy, a technical career, at the Antonio Lorena Superior Institute in the city of Cusco.”

Lesli is a pharmacy technician and a young professional who is hard working and responsible and who is seeking opportunities to have a better quality of life.  She and her mother, Nancy, have a family business consisting in raising livestock.  On this opportunity, Lesli needs the loan to buy animal feed and to buy a few animals.

loans.use: to buy animal feed and to buy a few animals.

loans.name: Feliciana

texts.es:
Felicia tiene 39 años, es natural de chilca y vive con sus 2 hijos en su casa propia desde hace 20 años. Hace más de 5 años que esta dedicándose a la elaboración de artesanías en base a tejidos bordados y de lana. Consideró que el mercado de los bordados estaba un poco saturado por lo que optó innovar en sus productos artesanales.
Es así que con la ayuda de sus hijos, elaboran novedosos diseños, y durante 6 días tiene un centenar de prendas listas para ser vendidas a los comerciantes de artesanías que trabajan los fines de semana en la feria comercial de su localidad. Para Felicia es importante contar con capital  de respaldo para seguir elaborando más prendas bordadas y no esperar hasta que termine de pagarle sus clientes para volverlo a invertir, por ello se ha propuesto a tener a la mano ingresos extras. Es la primera vez que tiene un crédito con MFP,  supo de los crédito grupales por medio de su vecina que la invitó y después de informarse vio que era lo mas conveniente para el fortalecimiento de su negocio. En esta oportunidad invertirá su dinero en la compra de alambres, lana de diferentes colores, cintas y pegamentos que son los materiales  básicos para la elaboración de bordados.
texts.en:
Felicia, 39, is from Chilca and has lived in her own house with her two children for the last 20 years.  For over five years now she’s been making crafts based on embroidered fabric and wool.  She thought that the embroidery market was a bit saturated so she opted for innovating her crafts.  So, with help from her children, she makes novel designs and in a span of six days produces a hundred items ready to be sold to crafts merchants that work weekends in the local commercial market.  For Felicia, it’s important to have back-up capital to continue making embroidered items and not have to wait until her customers pay her to reinvest.  Because of this, she’s decided to have extra income on hand.

This is the first time she’s had an MFP loan.  She found out about the group loans through a neighbor who invited her and once she informed herself about it she saw that it was the most convenient way to strengthen her business.  

On this occasion she will use the money to buy wire, yarn in assorted colors, ribbons and adhesives which are the basic materials needed to do the embroidery.

loans.use: to buy yarn in assorted colors, ribbons and adhesives.

loans.name: Silvia

texts.es: Silvia, tiene la edad de 31 años, está separada  y vive con sus 2 hijos y que son su mayor prioridad. Ella pretende con el crédito realizar la compra de alimentos para la crianza de cerdos. Ella cuenta con un proyecto de cría de cerdos para su posterior venta a nivel local. Ella quiere tener los animales con buen alimento para engordarlos antes del tiempo establecido. Ella quiere generara ganancias con la ventas de sus cerdos para tener un bienestar familiar mejor y un nivel de vida mejor con sus hijos. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Silvia, 31, is separated and lives with her two children who are her greatest priority.  She intends to use the loan to buy feed to raise pigs.  She has a project to raise pigs for subsequent sale locally.  She wants to feed the pigs good feed to fatten them up more quickly than usual.  She wants to generate profits from the sale of her pigs to have improved family wellbeing and a better standard of living with her children.

This is the first loan she’s gotten from Fudecosur.   She has not had any loans previously from state banks but Fudecosur provided a loan with the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy pig feed.

loans.name: Martha Lorena

texts.es: Martha Lorena tiene 33 años, su actividad es la venta de mercadería en general. Hace más de 5 años que tiene este negocio. Martha tiene que alistar su bolso todos los días para empezar a ofrecer a la gran variedad de clientes que tiene sus diferentes productos, con las ganancias por la venta de sus productos trata de cubrir todos sus gastos y mejorar el nivel de vida de su familia. Para poder ampliar su negocio ha solicitado un para comprar pantalones, toallas, sabanas, calzado, tratamientos y ropa en general. Martha es una persona responsable, dedicada y trabajadora que se preocupa por darles mayores comodidades a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Martha Lorena is 33 years old. She works selling general merchandise. She's owned her business for 5 years. Martha has to use her own funds every day to start offering different products to her wide range of clients. With the proceeds from the product sales she tries to cover all her expenses and improve her family's quality of life. 

To expand her business she has requested a loan to buy trousers, towels, sheets, shoes and other items of clothing. Martha is a responsible, dedicated and hard working person who tries to give her children a more comfortable life.

loans.use: to buy trousers, towels, sheets, shoes and other items of clothing.

loans.name: Lucia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al Banco Comunal “SEÑOR DE LOS MILAGROS DE CHIMPAHUAYLLA”; El banco pertenece al distrito de Huanchac, Provincia de Cusco, departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Lucia; la socia tiene 35 años; la socia es conviviente; La socia tiene 2 hijos y ella se dedica al cuidado de la casa y crianza de animales menores, la socia realiza trabajaos de bisutería en casa, la socia compra materiales para la realización de aretes, collares, pulseras, la socia compra alambres, accesorios de ganchos diversos, mostacillas de colores, y luego los lleva a vender a sus amigas y a diferentes instituciones según el tiempo en el cual la socia disponga; el conyugue de la socia trabaja de obrero en diferentes obras y construcciones, la socia siempre está viendo diferente trabajos según la época y de este modo  apoya en casa con el ingresos de sus negocios de temporada y este de la bisutería. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de materiales para realizar los diferentes  trabajos.

La socia se muestra muy satisfecha y agradecida por el apoyo que se le brindara mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus deudas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Lucia, 35, is a member of the “Señor de los Milagros de Chimpahuaylla” communal bank that belongs to Huanchac District, Cusco Province and Department.

She has a spouse and two children.  She’s a housewife and raises small farm animals.  She also makes costume jewelry at home.  She buys supplies to make earrings, necklaces and bracelets.  She buys wire, assorted hooks, colored beads.  She then sells them to her friends and to various institutions according to how much time she has available.  Her spouse works as a laborer in various jobs and construction projects.  She is always seeking out work according to the season and this is how she contributes to her household’s support with income from her seasonal work and from her jewelry making.  She is asking for the loan to buy supplies to do her various jobs.

She is very satisfied with and grateful for the support she’ll get through this means and commits to pay her debts in a timely fashion.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Paoline

texts.fr: Paoline est âgée de 29 ans et vit au Bénin. Paoline est mariée à un mécanicien du nom de Denis. Le couple a deux enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Paoline et son mari vivent ensemble avec leurs enfants et assurent ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Paoline a arrêté les classes au cours primaire. Pour subvenir à ses besoins et assurer les besoins de ses enfants, Paoline vend depuis une dizaine d'année des mèches et des boissons dans un marché du Bénin. Paoline s'approvisionne au Togo et au Bénin. Dans le but de renforcer son activité afin de mieux répondre à la forte demande de sa clientèle, Paoline sollicite un quatrième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les trois premiers prêts dont Paoline avaient bénéficié ont été tous bien remboursés.
texts.en:
Paoline is 29 years old and lives in Benin. She is married to a mechanic by the name of Denis. They have two children, who are both in school and in their care. Paoline and her husband live together with their children and jointly ensure that the various family expenses are covered. 

Paoline dropped out of primary school. To support herself and her children, she has been selling hair extensions and beverages at a market in Benin for about ten years. She gets her supplies from Togo and from Benin. With the goal of bolstering her business to respond better to the strong customer demand, she is requesting a fourth loan from ALIDé. The three previous ones from which she benefited have all been completely repaid.

loans.use: to buy hair extensions and beverages

loans.name: Indhira

texts.en: Indhira is 21 years old and single. She is currently a student at the National University of San Antonio Abad Cusco. In addition, she also sells cellphones and cellphone accessories on the side. She is asking for a loan in order to buy more cellphones and cellphone accessories to sell. The profits from her business help to pay for her university tuition, so she is motivated to have a successful business. Indhira is committed to making the necessary payments on time.

loans.use: to buy more cellphones and cellphone accessories to sell

loans.name: Gustavo

texts.es: Gustavo tiene 24 años, vive con su madre. Actualmente administra los terrenos que le cedió su padre. Sus padres lo instruyeron con los conocimientos básicos del campo y desde muy joven asumió el mando en esta tarea, ya que su padre no podía hacerlo debido a su edad. Durante un tiempo estuvo en entrenamiento, y ahora sólo se desempeña en la agricultura, sembrando papa, zanahoria, maíz y cebolla, que son los productos que más le generan ganancias. Para realizar este trabajo siempre contrata mano de obra para optimizar su tiempo. Adicionalmente a esto,  siempre  busca  la manera de capacitarse y pedir orientación en temas agrícolas, para así estar prevenido ante  cualquier problema que pueda suscitarse. Por otro lado siempre necesita de capital para  seguir invirtiendo en esta actividad por lo que le es muy necesario los créditos que facilita MFP. Es la tercera vez en la cual solicita un crédito con MFP, y aún permanece su entusiasmo de trabajar como lo fue en su primer crédito porque sabe que es una oportunidad para mantener estable su trabajo. En esta ocasión comprará sacos de abono orgánico así como semillas de papa y maíz.
texts.en: Gustavo is 24 years old and lives with his mother.   He is currently managing the land that his father left him.  His parents taught him the basics about farming.  From a very young age he assumed responsibility for this work since his father couldn't do it because of his age.  For a time he was in training, but now works alone planting potatoes, carrots, corn and onions as these crops generate the most income.  In order to do this job he has to hire labor so that he can make the most of his time.  In addition, he is always looking for ways to train and ask for guidance on agricultural issues so that he can be ready for any problem that may arise.  Furthermore, he always needs capital to continue investing in farming so for this reason the loans through MFP are a must.  This is his third time requesting a loan with MFP and he remains as enthusiastic about his work as if it were his first loan because he knows that this is an opportunity to maintain stable work.  With this loan he will buy bags of organic compost, and potato and corn seeds.

loans.use: purchase bags or organic compost and potato and corn seeds.

loans.name: Valeriana

texts.es:
En la comunidad de Tambo Real de la provincia de Anta departamento en la reunión del banco comunal “Solidaridad Tambo Real” conocimos a la socia Valeriana y nos cuenta: 

“Nací en la comunidad de Tambo Real, tengo 31 años edad, tengo 5 hijos y vivo en la comunidad de Tambo Real y mi actividad económica principal es  la venta de leche y la elaboración de queso”. 

Valeriana es ganadera y agricultora donde se dedica a la venta de leche y la elaboración de queso. Ya son 25 años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. En esta oportunidad Valeriana requiere el préstamo para comprar alimento para los animales e insumos para elaborar queso.
texts.en:
In the community of Tambo Real in the province of Anta, at the meeting of the communal bank "Solidarity Tambo Real", we meet the member Valeriana and she tells us:

"I was born in the community of Tambo Real, and I am 31 years old.  I have 5 children and I live in the community of Tambo Real.  My main economic activity is selling milk and cheese production."

Valeriana has livestock and is a farmer who sells milk and makes cheese.  She has been doing this for 25 years, and it has been going very well thanks to the effort she puts into her work. 

This time Valeriana is requesting the loan to buy animal feed and supplies for making cheese.

loans.use: to buy animal feed and supplies for making cheese.

loans.name: Nyabukara Banywani Group

texts.en: Mustafa is a 38-year-old married man with four children. His family lives in a permanent house in Fort Portal, Uganda. He has the responsibility of looking after his family. His dream is to educate his children to the university level. He has been a carpenter for 18 years; the income from his business has enabled him to keep his children in school. He has challenges paying the high cost of electricity for his business. His dream is to set up a modern workshop. Mustafa needs this loan to pay his child's school fees.

loans.use: To pay his child's school fees.

loans.name: Véronique

texts.fr: Véronique est âgé de 48 ans et est mariée à un revendeur du nom de Daouda. Le couple a trois enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Véronique et son mari vivent ensemble avec leurs enfants au Bénin. Le couple supporte ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Véronique a arrêté l'école au cours secondaire. Il y près de sept ans que Véronique vend des produits de SOBEBRA (des boissons) dans une ville du Bénin. Véronique s'approvisionne auprès des grossistes au Bénin. C'est la première fois que Véronique sollicite un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Ce crédit lui servira à renforcer son capital et à rehausser le niveau de son activité afin de mieux répondre aux exigence de sa clientèle.
texts.en: Véronique is 48 years old and married to a retailer named Daouda. The couple have three children, all in school and in their care. Véronique and her husband live together with their children in Benin. The couple provide for the household together. Véronique ended her studies in secondary school. For close to seven years, she has sold "Sobrera" products (drinks) in a city in Benin. She gets her supplies from the wholesalers in Benin. This is the first time Véronique is seeking a loan through ALIDÉ. This loan will serve to strengthen her capital and raise the level of her business in order to better respond to the demands of her clientele.

loans.use: To buy cases of drinks.

loans.name: Marlitt

texts.en: Marlitt is 22 years old and single. She is currently a student at the National University of San Antonio Abad in Cusco. She is asking for a loan in order to help pay for her university tuition. Marlitt has to pay for her schooling on her own. She is very grateful for the loan because it means she will be able to afford school. Marlitt is committed to her studies and very passionate about learning. She promises to make all the necessary loan payments on time.

loans.use: to pay for her university tuition.

loans.name: Henry

texts.es: Henry, tiene la edad de 24 años, está soltero. El pretende con el crédito realizar la compra de abonos para la asistencia de su cafetal. El cuenta con el terreno apto para la explotación, el tiene el terreno ya sembrado de café y lo que le hará es asistirlo par así obtener mejores cosechas este próximo año. El quiere generar ganancias para su bienestar y seguir creciendo con el proyecto cafetalero y cada día más fortalecerlo para su buena producción.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Henry, 24, is single.  He intends to use the loan to buy manure for his coffee plants.  He has a piece of farmland that’s apt for exploitation and it’s already planted with coffee.  What he will do now is provide assistance so that it will produce better harvests next year.  He wants to generate income for his wellbeing and to continue growing as a coffee producer strengthening it daily so that it will produce better.


This is the first loan he’s gotten from Fudecosur.  He has had no previous loans from state banks but Fudecosur offered the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase lipstick, nail polish, cream, beauty treatments, powder, perfume, and other items.

loans.name: Amadu

texts.en:
This is 49-year-old Amadu. He is married to a petty trader and has five children, ages 6, 9, 14, 17 and 21 years. In 1991, Amadu established his smoked fish business. He began his business because his late father used to deal in fish trading, so when he grew up he joined him in the business until he became perfect at selling fish. He is making good profits. Working 7 days a week and 7 hours a day, he earns about 1,100,000 leones (SLL) every month from his business. Amadu serves retailing business women from the villages and in town. Amadu trades on the west coast where he gets a larger quantity of fish. He travels by vehicle at least twice per month for his business. Rise in transport costs affect him greatly and, though competition is high, he interacts well with his customers so usually he gains more customers. 

Amadu would like a loan in the amount of 4,500,000 SLL. He has already received and successfully repaid one loan and now requires a new loan in order to buy one basket of herring fish for 2,000,000 SLL and two baskets of assorted fish for 1,200,000 SLL. He hopes that this loan will enable him to increase his monthly profits by approximately 300,000 SLL. In the future, Amadu plans to improve on his business and also see that his children go through university. He plans to save some of his profits for his children's education and to add some on to his capital. He is hardworking and honest. Being in business with a good sum of capital is very important because you can buy enough quality product, says Amadu; therefore, he plans to be accessing loans to achieve his aims. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to pay for fish: herring fish for 2,000,000 leones and two baskets of  assorted fish for 1,200,000 leones.

loans.name: Yuri

texts.en: Yuri is 36 years old and married with one daughter who is one year old. His occupation is selling electronics in various markets around Cusco seven days a week. He is asking for a loan in order to make improvements to his house. Specifically, he plans to purchase cement and bricks as he wants to make his house larger. Yuri is a hardworking man and is committed to making all of the necessary loan payments on time.

loans.use: to buy cement and bricks to make improvements to his house.

loans.name: Mackline

texts.en:
Mackline is a 21-year-old married woman with two children who lives in a rented house in Kamwenge, Uganda.  She dreams of educating her children up to university.  She has been selling clothes for five years and got her initial capital for the business from farming.  She faces challenges in raising funds to meet the demands of her customers, and her desire is to have a boutique.

Mackline intends to use the loan to buy second-hand clothes for sale.

loans.use: To buy second-hand clothes for sale.

loans.name: Sylvie Soudéa

texts.fr: Sylvie Soudéa est âgée de 35 ans et est mariée à Léonce, un architecte. Le couple a cinq enfants tous scolarisés et encore à leur charge. Sylvie Soudéa et son mari assurent ensemble les différentes charges de la famille. Sylvie Soudéa vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Après avoir arrêté l'école au cours secondaire, Sylvie Soudéa mène comme activité la vente charbon de bois au Bénin. Il y a une dizaine d'année que Sylvie Soudéa mène cette activité qui lui procure des revenus l'aidant à subvenir aux besoins de sa famille. Sylvie Soudéa achète ses produits auprès des grossistes au Bénin et les revend à son domicile. C’est la cinquième fois que Sylvie Soudéa sollicite un financement auprès de ALIDé, en vue d’élever le niveau de son activité et de mieux satisfaire la demande de sa clientèle. Les crédits obtenus précédemment ont été tous bien remboursés.
texts.en: Sylvie Soudéa is 35 years old and married to Léonce, an architect. The couple have five children, all in school and in their care. Sylvie Soudéa and her husband provide for the family together. Sylvie Soudéa lives together with her husband and children. After having ended her studies at the secondary level, she began running a business selling charcoal in Benin. She has run this business for about ten years, and it provides her with an income that helps her provide for the family. She buys her products from the wholesalers in Benin and re-sells the goods at her house. This is the fifth time she is seeking a loan with ALIDÉ in order to raise the level of her business and better satisfy the demands of her clientele. All of her previous loans were repaid properly.

loans.use: To buy bags of charcoal.

loans.name: Melvin Jesus

texts.es: Melvin Jesús, tiene la edad 25 de  años, está soltero y vive con su padres. El pretende con el crédito realizar la compra de concentrado para el engorde de cerdos. El cuenta con varios cerdos a su poder y lo que pretende es darle alimentación con concentrado para su engorde más rápido. El quiere tener sus animales con el peso ideal para su posterior venta en el mercado de la localidad o lugares aledaños. El quiere generar la mayor cantidad de ganancias para su bienestar  y la de sus padres y crecer con le proyecto de cría de cerdos. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Melvin Jesús, 25, is single living with his parents.  He intends to use the loan to buy feed concentrate to fatten up pigs.  He has several pigs in his possession and he intends to feed them concentrate to fatten them up more quickly.  He wants his animals to reach ideal weight to sell them in the local and nearby markets.  He wants to earn higher profits for his and his parents’ wellbeing and to grow with this pig raising project.

This is his first Fudecosur loan.  He’s had no previous loans in state banks but Fudecosur offered the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy pig feed.

loans.name: Pedro Paolo

texts.es: El Sr. Pedro, es casado y tiene un hijo  de dos años, el cual aún no asiste al colegio.  Su esposa  es ama  de casa y se dedica al cuidado de su menor hijo. Nuestro cliente es maestro constructor, eligió este tipo de trabajo por un tío suyo;  trabaja desde hace cinco años. Con esfuerzo y dedicación aprendió el oficio  de la construcción y ahora es maestro.   Gana aproximadamente 500  soles semanales.  Los  desafíos  que enfrenta Pedro es la salud de su menor hijo, ya q por este tiempo de invierno, los cuidados que deben de tener con él son mayores. El sueño de Pedro es construir su casa  y dar  una buena educación a su menor hijo. El crédito lo va a invertir en comprar  más herramientas de construcción (tablas, picos, lampas) y algunos artefactos para  su hogar. Pedro es una persona muy emprendedora y trabajadora. Se encuentra muy agradecido por haberle brindado esta gran oportunidad.
texts.en:
Pedro is married and has a two-year-old son who doesn’t attend school yet.  His wife’s a housewife dedicated to caring for their son.  

Our client is a master builder.  He chose this line of work thanks to an uncle; he’s been working for the last five years.  He learned construction skills with effort and dedication and now he’s a master builder.  He earns approximately 500 soles per week.

The challenge Pedro faces is his son’s health because in the winter they have to be extra careful about young children's health.  Pedro’s dream is to build his house and to provide his son with a good education.

He will use the loan to buy more work tools (lumber, pickaxes, shovels) and to buy some home appliances.  Pedro is a very enterprising, hard working person.  He is very grateful for having been granted this great opportunity.

loans.use: to buy tools.

loans.name: John

texts.en:
This is John, who is 37 years old. He is married to a businesswoman and has 1 child, aged 11 years. He also has 1 other dependent who lives with him because he is a school-going child.

John established his own electronics business in 2004, after first joining his brother in selling cassettes. He began his business because he did not have any assistance to further his studies. He works 6 days a week, 10 hours a day, and earns about 650,000 Sierra Leonean leones (SLL) per month. 

John would like a loan in the amount of 3,000,000 SLL. He has already received and successfully repaid 2 loans and now needs a new loan in order to buy 5 cartons of cassette tapes @ 430,000 SLL, 10 dozen VCDs @ 6,600 SLL, and 5 cartons of DVDs @ 4,500 SLL. He hopes this loan will enable him to increase his monthly profits by approximately 200,000 SLL.

In the future, John plans to further his studies, build a house if he can access more loans and maximize profits, and see his child through school. The rains are affecting him because the construction of the market center has required changes in location that are not favorable for his business. Competition is always high, but in going for quality products he has always had good sales, and he serves good numbers of customers in the main town and surrounding villages.

John usually goes twice a week to Freetown to buy his goods. He normally goes by vehicle. He plans to open a big shop where he can order a large volume of goods. He is hardworking and honest, his business is good, and he hopes to access more loans in the future.  He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy assorted cassettes, VCDs, and DVDs.

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria is 62 years old and married with four children. Her occupation is teaching crafts such as embroidery and how to make sweaters and blankets. She also sells crafts she makes herself. She is asking for a loan in order to buy more materials for making her own crafts. Specifically, she plans to purchase string, yarn, beads, and lace.

Maria is passionate about craft-making and very hardworking. She is committed to making all of the necessary loan payments on time.

loans.use: to buy more string, yarn, beads, and lace to make crafts

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fish, shellfish, shrimp, crabs, and prawns

loans.name: Marleny

texts.es: Marleny  es natural D. Huancayo, vive con su esposo y sus 3 hijos en casa D. sus padres. DesD. que nació, sus padres le inculcaron en elL. el gusto D. trabajar en las tareas del campo, Cuando llega a L. adolescencia llega a radicar en L. ciudad D. Huancayo para buscar mejores oportunidades, sin embargo optó por vender ganado en las ferias comerciales, actividad que más le agrada. Es así que compra a un menor precio los animales y al cabo D. un rigoroso tiempo alimentándolos, los revenD. en L. misma feria a un precio más alto. Con los años D. experiencia, sabe identificar que animales debe o no comprar y no dejarse engañar con animales enfermos que pueD. afectar su inversión. Durante toda L. semana tiene disponible su capital para estar en búsqueda D. animales como ovejas, cerdos y toros. Para Marleny es un buen negocio desarrollar estas actividades que le permite mejorar su economía para el bienestar D. su familia. Es su tercer crédito que trabaja D. L. mano con MFP, durante todo este tiempo ha demostrado ser puntual en sus pagos y se ha ganado L. confianza D. los demás integrantes D. su grupo solidario. Con el dinero que solicita, lo seguirá invirtiendo en L. compra D. más animales porque en esta época del año tiene más ventas y requiere D. incrementar su capital D. trabajo.
texts.en:
Marleny is from Huancayo.  She lives with her husband and three children in her parents’ house.  Since she was born her parents instilled in her the joy of working doing field chores.  When she became an adolescent she moved to the city of Huancayo seeking better opportunities.  However, she opted to sell cattle at the commercial markets, the activity that most pleases her.  This is how she buys animals at a lower price and after a rigorous period of time feeding them she resells them at the same market for a higher price.  With all these years of experience she knows which animals to buy and which ones to pass on and she is not fooled by animals that might be sick and affect her profits.  She has her capital available all week to seek out sheep, pigs and bulls.  For Marleny, it’s good business to develop these activities that allow her to improve her economy for her family’s wellbeing.

This is her third loan working hand in hand with MFP.  During all this time she’s been punctual with her repayments and has won over her fellow members’ trust.  She will use the requested funds to buy more animals because this season of the year she has more sales and needs to increase her working capital.

loans.use: to buy more cows and bulls.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for palm oil  and 30 bags of garri

loans.name: Minandégo

texts.fr: Minandégo est âgé de 31 ans et vit au Bénin. Minandégo est marié à une revendeuse du nom de Victorine et a quinze enfants à charge, dont seulement trois représentent ses propres enfants. Parmi les enfants, certains sont scolarisés. Minandégo vit ensemble avec sa femme et ses enfants. Grâce au revenu que lui procure son activité, Minandégo assure sans grande difficulté les besoins de sa famille. Minandégo n'a jamais été à l'école. Minandégo a appris le métier de vulcanisation. De façon secondaire, Minandégo vend des pneus, des chambres à air et également de l'acide dans son quartier. Dans le but de renforcer son activité et de l'étendre par l'ouverture d'autres boutiques de ventes de ses produits, Minandégo sollicite auprès de ALIDé, un deuxième crédit. Le premier prêt a été remboursé sans difficulté.
texts.en: Minandégo is 31 years old and lives in Benin. He is married to a retailer named Victorine and has fifteen children in his care, of whom only three are his own. Among the children, some attend school. Minandégo lives together with his wife and children. Thanks to the income from his business, he is able to provide for his family without too much difficulty. Minandégo never attended school. He is trained in the field of vulcanization. On the side, Minandégo sells tires, inner tubes, and also battery acid in his area. With the goal of strengthening his business and extending it by opening other stores to sell his products, Minandégo is seeking his second loan through ALIDÉ. The first loan was repaid without difficulty.

loans.use: To buy inner tubes, tires, and battery acid.

loans.name: Rimber

texts.en:
Rimber is 32 years old and married with one son. He is the owner of a travel agency in Cusco. His business is successful, as there are many tourists who visit the Cusco region. He offers trips to Machu Picchu and other interesting sites around Cusco. 

He is asking for a loan in order to buy a printer for his office. Rimber greatly enjoys his work and is very hardworking. He is committed to making the necessary loan payments on time.

loans.use: to buy a printer for his travel agency.

loans.name: Tomas

texts.es: Tomas es natural de Huachac, tiene 24 años, vive en casa de sus padres con la compañía de su madre y hermanos en los terrenos heredados donde actualmente cultiva. Tiene 5 años de experiencia en las tareas agrícolas, aprendió de sus padres que siempre  lo motivaron a seguir esta actividad. Los productos que siembra son: quinua y  arveja, productos que tiene mucha demanda en el mercado. Ella esta muy agradecida por todas la enseñanzas que sus padres le dejaron, ya que así puede afrontar los problemas que se le presentan en este trabajo. Cuando es temporada de siembra o cosecha, sale muy temprano para  preparar la tierra, fertilizarlas, así como cuidarlas de la amenaza de plaga de insectos que asechan sus plantas. Para el futuro extender sus terrenos de cultivo. Es la sexta ves que esta trabajando con MFP de manera grupal, en todo este tiempo el siempre ha sido puntual en sus pagos y tiene mas trayectoria de trabajo a comparación de los demás integrantes de su grupo solidario. En esta ocasión invertirá el dinero que solicita, para contratar a los peones, quienes la ayudaran a cosecha y ara la tierra para la siguiente siembra.
texts.en:
Tomas was born in Huachac.  He is 24, and lives in his parents' home in the company of his mother and brothers, on the family land which he currently cultivates.  He has 5 years experience in agricultural work, which he learned from his parents who always encouraged him to follow this activity. 

The crops that he plants are quinoa and peas, which are products in high demand at the market.  He is very grateful for all the lessons his parents gave him, as with them he can address the problems that this work presents.  During planting season or harvest, he leaves home very early to prepare the soil, fertilize it and watch out for the threat of insect infestations that lurk in the plants.  In the future, he hopes to extend their farmland.  

This is his sixth time working with MFP as part of a group.  In all this time, he has always been punctual in his repayments, and he has more work history in comparison to the other members of his solidarity group.  This time, he will invest the money required to hire laborers, who will help him with the harvest and plowing for the next planting.

loans.use: to hire laborers.

loans.name: Mahougnon Group

texts.fr: MAHOUGNON est un groupe de trois personnes, dont les membres résident dans le même quartier au Bénin et sont des parentés. La représentante du groupe, Mahoumè Elisabeth (dont la main est levée sur la photo), est âgée de 35 ans et vit au Bénin. Mahoumè Elisabeth ne vit plus avec son mari. Mahoumè Elisabeth a trois enfants, tous scolarisés, dont deux sont à sa charge. Grâce au revenu que lui procure son activité, Mahoumè Elisabeth assure sans grande difficulté les différents besoins de ses enfants. Mahoumè Elisabeth a arrêté l'école au cours secondaire. Mahoumè Elisabeth vend en effet de l'huile à moteur importé et des produits divers à son domicile. De façon secondaire, Mahoumè Elisabeth vend des "pâtés" (faits à base de la farine de blé). Mahoumè Elisabeth s'approvisionne dans une ville du Bénin et exerce cette activité depuis une dizaine d'année. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle, Mahoumè Elisabeth sollicite un deuxième crédit avec les autres membres du groupe MAHOUGNON. Ce crédit leur servira à mieux répondre aux demandes de leur clientèle et à se faire plus de profits.
texts.en: Mahougnon is a group of three individuals who live in the same neighborhood in Benin and are related to each other. The group’s representative, Mahoumè Elisabeth (raising her hand in the photo) is 35 years and lives in Benin. Mahoumè Elisabeth is separated from her husband. She has three children, all in school, two of whom are in her care. Thanks to the income from her business activity, Mahoumè Elisabeth manages to provide for her children. She did not finish high school. She sells imported motor oil and miscellaneous items out of her home. As a secondary activity, she sells “pâtes”  from wheat flour [wheat-meal mush, a staple food]. Mahoumè Elisabeth stocks up in one of the Benin towns. She has been in this business for about a dozen years. With the goal of meeting customer demand, Mahoumè Elisabeth is seeking a second loan, together with other members of the Mahougnon group. This loan will allow the group members to better meet customer demand and to increase their revenues.

loans.use: to buy jugs of motor oil and miscellaneous items for resale

loans.name: Riqchary Huarmimasicuna Group

texts.es:
Todo empezó una noche en el cual me comunicaron con el analista de crédito Ferdinan para realizar un viaje donde  visitaríamos al banco comunal “Riqchary Huarmimasicuna” y nuestro destino era el poblado de KITENI, distrito de Echarate provincia de La Convención del departamento del Cusco, Perú. El poblado de Kiteni está ubicado a  8 horas de la ciudad de Quillabamba. 

El banco comunal “Riqchary Huarmimasicuna” tiene 5 años de funcionamiento y está conformado por personas que son trabajadores y emprendedores que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. La mayoría de los pobladores se dedican a actividades de comercio, ganadería y agricultura. Las reuniones del banco comunal son cada treinta días en el poblado de Kiteni y donde conocimos al socia Ruth Mery. 

Ruth Mery nos cuenta: “Nací en la ciudad de Kiteni, tengo 23 años edad y todavía no tengo hijos pero muy pronto seré mamá y vivo en la ciudad donde nací y donde mi actividad principal es la venta de comida”.
Ruth Mery tiene un pequeño restaurante donde sirve desayuno, almuerzo y cena pero por el momento el negocio está paralizado porque el local lo estan refaccionando. Ya es un año que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Ruth Mery por el momento está trabajando en una lavandería lavando ropa desde las 7 de la mañana hasta el medio día de lunes a viernes. Su padre le invito a participar en el banco comunal y su primer crédito fue de S/. 800 nuevos soles y lo utilizó para comprar insumos. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para implementar su restaurante y desea comprar sillas, mesas y utensilios.
texts.en:
It all started one night when I spoke with a loan analyst, Ferdinan, in order for us to visit the Riqchary Huarmimasicuna Communal Bank.  Our destination was the town of Kiteni, Echarate district, La Convención province, Cusco department in Perú.  The town of Kiteni is eight hours from the city of Quillabama.

The Riqchary Huarmimasicuna Communal Bank has been operational for five years.  It is comprised of hard-working and enterprising people who, at every moment, are seeking opportunities to get ahead.  Through their daily efforts they are looking to give their children a better future.  The majority of the inhabitants devote themselves to commerce, livestock, and farming.  The communal bank meets once a month in the town of Kiteni.  This is where we met a member, Ruth Mery.

Ruth Mery tell us, “I was born in the city of Kiteni.  I am 23 years old.  I do not yet have children, but I will soon be a mother.  I live in the city where I was born and where my primary business activity is selling food.”  Ruth Mery has a small restaurant where she sells breakfast, lunch, and dinner.  At the moment the business is incapacitated because they are refurbishing the place.

She has been in the business for one year, and it is going very well for her thanks to the effort she puts into her work.  At this time Ruth Mery is working in a laundry washing clothes from seven in the morning until midday on Mondays through Fridays.

Her father invited her to participate in the communal bank.  Her first loan was for 800 soles, and she used it to buy supplies.  This time she needs the loan to equip her restaurant, and she wants to buy chairs, tables, and utensils.

loans.use: to equip her restaurant and buy chairs, tables, and utensils.

loans.name: Ketty

texts.es: Ketty vive en su tierra natal en compañía de su esposo  y sus 2 hijos en su propia casa. Desde que era niña aprendió el valor del trabajo, cuidando animales y siempre ayudando a sus padres en las tareas del campo. Cuando formó su hogar, opto por otro trabajo adicional a la agricultura y a la crianza de animales, pues no le era muy  rentable. Es así que tiene su carpintería, además la experiencia en este rubro que posee su esposo la ayuda mucho para emprender este negocio. Ya tiene 7 años realizando esta actividad, diseñando bellos trabajos en madera como muebles para el hogar. Ahora necesita implementar su taller con más instrumentos para que sus acabados sean de mejor calidad. Son 12 veces en las cuales ha solicitado un crédito con MFP, es testigo de todos los acontecimientos de su grupo solidario y la que siempre esta dispuesta a compartir sus experiencias positivas ante sus demás compañeros. En esta ocasión el dinero que solicita, le servirá para comprarse más madera y aumentar así su producción.
texts.en:
Ketty lives in the place of her birth with her husband and two children in her own house.  Since childhood she learned the value of work caring for animals and always helping her parents with the chores in the fields.   When she formed her own home, she opted for work in addition to agriculture and raising livestock because it wasn’t very profitable.  This is how she ended up with a carpentry shop.  Her husband’s experience in this line of work has been very helpful for her to launch this business.  She’s been in it now for 7 years designing beautiful wood items of home furniture.  She now needs to equip her shop with more tools so that her work will be higher quality.

It’s been 12 times that she’s asked for MFP loans.  She’s been a witness to all her communal group’s accomplishments and she is always willing to share her positive experiences with the other members.  On this occasion, she’ll use the requested money to buy more lumber and increase production.

loans.use: to buy more lumber.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to open a new shop and fill it with inventory.

loans.name: El Centenario De Machu Picchu Group

texts.es: LA SRA KAREN D. 23 AÑOS D. EDAS ES MADRE SOLTERA  D.  UN HIJO D.  2 AÑOS D. EDAD.ELLA ES LA SOCIA DEL GRUPO CENTENARIO D. MACHU PICCHU .KAREN  VEND. COMIDA EN LA CALLE  RICARDO PALMA ,ES AMBULANTE . KAREN SALE A VENDER TODOS LOS DIAS TEMPRANO HASTA QUE TERMINE SU COMIDA .SOLICITO EL PRESTAMO PARA  PODER IMPLEMENTAR SU  CARPA PARA SU NEGOCIO .KAREN QUISIERA PARA EL FUTURO PODER TENER  SU PROPIO RESTURANTE EN  UN LOCAL YA ESTABLECIDO .LA SRA KAREN  SE UBICA  A ESPALDAS D.  LA SRA. D. CASACA D. COLOR PLOMO KAREN VISTE  UNA CASACA COLOR CREMA.
texts.en: Karen, 23, is a single mother of a two-year-old son.  She’s a member of the “Centenario D. Machu Picchu” communal bank.  She sells food on Ricardo Palma Street.  She’s a street vendor.  Karen goes out daily very early to sell her food and works until she sells out.  She asked for the loan to set up her business’ sales tent.  In the future, Karen would like to have her own restaurant in an established locale.   Karen is standing behind the lady wearing the gray jacket.  Karen’s wearing a cream colored jacket.

loans.use: to buy a tent for the business.

loans.name: Stepan

texts.ru:
Степан женат и у него трое сыновей. Степан живет с семьей в родном городе Хуст, Западная Украина. Клиент занимается проведением отопления в домах и установкой отопительного оборудования. Он – отличный мастер, поэтому у него всегда нет отбоя от заказов. Степан занимается этим делом уже 12 лет. Ежемесячный доход около 8.000 гривен. 

Степан хотел бы вложить 8.000 гривен в приобретение новых инструментов, необходимых ему для ежедневной работы по установке отопительного оборудования. Степан собирается приобрести более мощный отбойный молоток и новый паяльник для меди. Приобретение этих инструментов ускорит и облегчит работу Степана. Со временем Степан планирует нанять несколько сотрудников и планомерно расширять свой бизнес и дальше.  

Пометка: история на РУССКОМ языке
texts.en:
Stepan is married and has three sons. Stepan lives with his family in his hometown of Hust, Western Ukraine. The client heats homes, installing heating equipment. He is a skilled craftsman, so he always has jobs. Stepan has been doing this work for twelve years. His monthly income is about 8,000 hryvnias. 

Stepan would like to invest 8,000 hryvnias in buying new tools he needs for his daily work of installing heating equipment. Stepan is going to buy a more powerful hammer drill and a new soldering iron for copper. The acquisition of these tools will accelerate and facilitate Stepan's work. Over time, Stepan plans to hire more staff members and plans to expand his business further.

loans.use: to buy a more powerful hammer drill and a new soldering iron for copper.

loans.name: Viktor

texts.ru:
Виктор родом из села Русская Долина, Западная Украина. Он работает водителем на частном предприятии уже около полугода. Виктор неженат. Он молод, энергичен, целеустремлен и трудолюбив. Он намерен усердно трудиться и зарабатывать на достойную жизнь себе и однажды своей будущей семье. 

Виктору необходим кредит в 8.000 гривен на личные нужды. Он планирует приобрести спальный гарнитур и сделать ремонт в своей комнате. Виктор надеется таким образом улучшить жилищные условия в доме, в котором проживает.  

Пометка: история на РУССКОМ языке
texts.en:
Victor was born in the village of Russian Valley, Western Ukraine. He has worked as a driver for a private enterprise for about six months. Victor is unmarried. He is young, energetic, purposeful and industrious. He intends to work hard and earn a decent living for himself and his future family. 

Victor needs a loan of 8,000 hryvnias for personal use. He plans to buy bedroom set and redecorate his room. Victor hopes to improve the living conditions in the home where he lives.

loans.use: buy a bedroom set and renovate his room

loans.name: Virgen Decarmen Group

texts.es:
LA SRA  CIRILA  DE 46 AÑOS DE EDAD  MADRE  SOLTERA  CON 3 HIJOS.ES LA SOCIA DEL GRUPO VIRGEN DE CARMEN .ELLA SE DEDICA A LOS BORDADOS  DE FUSTANES,  MANTAS  ETC . CIRILA  DESDE MUY TEMPRANO  HORAS DE LA MAÑANA  EMPIEZA A LABORAR CON SUS BORDADOS  PARA LAS FIESTAS  COSTUMBRISTAS DE TODO EL VALLE DEL MANTARO.SOLICITO EL PRESTAMO PARA  PODER COMPRAR MAS MATERIALES  PARA  LA ELABORACION  DE SUS BORDADOS .CIRILA PARA EL FUTURO QUISIERA COMPRAR MAS MAQUINAS INDUSTRIALES PARA LOS BORDADOS QUE REALIZA .
CIRILA SE ENCUENTRA UBICADA AL CENTRO A LADO DERECHO DE LA SRA QUE VISTE UNA CHOMPA COLOR CELESTE,CIRILA  ESTA DISFRAZADA CON  UNA VESTIMENTA TIPICA DE LA REGION ,TIENE EL CABELLO ONDULADO Y TIENE PUESTOS UNOS ARETES
texts.en:
Cirila, 46, is a single mother of three children.  She’s a member of the “Virgen del Carmen” communal bank.  She embroiders skirts, fabric, etc.  Cirila starts work very early in the morning.  She starts working on her embroidery for the traditional festivals in the entire Mantaro Valley.  

She requests the loan to buy more supplies to do the embroidery.  In the future, Cirila would like to buy industrial machines to do the embroidery.

Cirila appears in the center to the right of the lady wearing the sky blue sweater.  Cirila is wearing a traditional costume from the region.  She has wavy hair and is wearing earrings.

loans.use: to buy embroidery supplies.

loans.name: Elizabeth Del Carmen

texts.es:
Elizabeth del Carmen es una señora de 47años de edad, quien es vecina de una comunidad llamada San Francisco de la Palmera, localizada en San Carlos, en la provincia de Alajuela. Esta comunidad rural presenta mucho potencial de desarrollo, ya que a través de las actividades agrícolas es que ha logrado desarrollar actividades conexas y de servicios en la comunidad, tales como el ganado de engorde y la oportunidad de pequeños comercios y microempresas entre otros.
 Elizabeth desea continuar con sus estudios  de enfermería pero necesita algún tipo de ayuda ya que no tiene suficiente ayuda económica para seguir.
Actualmente Elizabeth está solicitando un microcrédito de ¢594,000 (quinientos noventa y cuatro  mil colones) para continuar con su carrera universitaria, ya que la inicio hace tres anos.
Con esta inversión espera poder surgir en sus metas personales y crecer mucho más como profesional. Todo esto ayudará a mejorar sus condiciones de vida y la de su familia. 
Elizabeth es socia de la Empresa de Crédito Comunal San Francisco de la Palmera, una de las 110 organizaciones socias de EDESA en Costa Rica. Este será su cuarto préstamo y con él espera continuar creciendo a nivel personal y económico, además de participar activamente en la organización de crédito en su comunidad.
texts.en:
Elizabeth del Carmen is a 47-year-old woman who lives in a community called San Francisco de la Palmera located in San Carlos, Alajuela Province.  This is a rural community with much potential for development because through agricultural activities it’s managed to develop associated activities and services in the community like raising livestock and opportunities for small business and micro businesses, among others.

Elizabeth would like to continue her nursing courses but needs some type of help because she does not have enough economic resources to continue.  She is asking for a micro loan of ¢594,000 (five-hundred ninety-four thousand colones) to continue her university studies that she started three years ago.

She hopes that with this investment she’ll be able to continue toward her personal goals and to grow much more professionally.  All of this will help her improve her and her family’s living conditions.

Elizabeth is a member of the San Francisco de la Palmera communal bank, one of EDESA’s 110 social organizations in Costa Rica.  This will be her fourth loan and she hopes with it to continue to grow both personally and economically as well as actively participate in a credit institution in her community.

loans.use: to pay her university tuition.

loans.name: Cenelia Del Carmen

texts.es: Cenelia Del Carmen es una emprendedora mujer de 37 años,  su actividad es la venta y elaboración de tortillas. Hace más de 16 años  que se dedica a este negocio con fondos propios, ella tiene 4 hijos que son menores de edad y están bajo su cargo. Ella inicio este negocio con mucho sacrificio y ganas de salir adelante pues su entusiasmo por mejorar cada día ha hecho de ella una persona trabajadora. El financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de maíz, cal, leña, bolsas, entre otros. Cenelia sueña con incrementar cada día más su actividad.
texts.en:
Cenelia Del Carmen, 37, is an enterprising woman.  Her activity is the manufacture and sale of tortillas.  She’s been in this business for over 6 years with funds of her own.  She has four minor children in her care.  She started the business with much sacrifice and a strong determination to get ahead because her enthusiasm to improve day to day has made her into a hard working person.

The loan she’s requesting will be used to buy corn, lime powder, firewood and bags, among others.  Cenelia dreams with increasing her activity more every day.

loans.use: to buy corn, lime powder, firewood and bags.

loans.name: Alexander

texts.es: Alexander  tiene 29 años de edad, soltero es un joven empeñoso y responsable, Ingeniero Ambiental de Recursos Naturales y estudiante de la carrera de Ciencias Bilogicas, esta en el octavo ciclo lo cual esta por culminar sus estudios en la universidad Nacional Mayor de San Marcos, obteniendo buenas calificaciones es optimista con respecto a sus estudios. Es un joven con grandes metas, en el futuro desea hacer su diplomado en el extranjero y viajar por el mundo dando conferencias a los estudiantes de diversas universidades. En sus tiempos libres ayuda a sus padres con el negocio de ventas de discos compactos . Con el reciente préstamo otorgado a  Alexander lo invertirá en el pago de sus estudios. Un muchacho con mucha creatividad y empeñoso en los estudios con una meta a futuro el cual es la culminación exitosa de los estudios que realiza.
texts.en: Alexander is 29 years old and single.  He is a tenacious and responsible young man who is an environmental resources engineer and is earning a degree in biology.   He will use the proceeds from his 8th loan cycle to finish his degree at the National University of San Marcos.  He is getting good grades and is optimistic about his studies.  He is a young person who has big goals: in the future he wants to get a degree abroad and travel throughout the world lecturing to students from different universities.  In his free time he helps his parents with their business selling compact discs.  With the loan he is being granted he will invest in paying for his education.  He is a creative young man who is tenacious in his studies, and his goal is to finish his education successfully.

loans.use: to pay for his education

loans.name: Deniz

texts.es: El deseo de hacer algo diferente de sus amigos de la secundaria motivó a Deniz  de 24 años de edad a estudiar en la universidad La Católica más de cinco años  y decidió que sería el ’lugar perfecto’ para estudiar y descubrir nuevos desafíos. Ahora habiéndose graduado con el título de ingeniero electrónico, Deniz confía  en que ha tomado la decisión correcta, el considera que aprender a ser independiente es uno de los resultados más importantes de la vida, ya que gran parte de los años en la universidad le ayudo su madre en el pago de los estudios. Cuando Deniz empezó a buscar trabajo se encontró  con muchos empleadores y decidió  trabaja en la Bolsa de Valores de lima como Asistente de Servicios de Negociación, su mayor sueño es llegar a tener su propia empresa y que el rubro este asociado con lo que estudió. En sus ratos libres le gustar jugar futbol con un grupo de la universidad, Con el actual préstamo lo utilizara para su curso de maestría.
texts.en:
Motivated to do something different than his friends from high school, Deniz, 24, enrolled in the La Católica University over five years ago deciding that it was the “perfect place” to study and discover new challenges.  Now, having graduated as an Electronics Engineer, Deniz is sure that he made the right decision.  He considers that learning to become independent is one of life’s most important results because his mother helped him pay for a large part of his university years expenses.  

When Deniz started to look for employment he found many options but decided to go to work for the Stock Market in Lima as a Negotiations Services Assistant.  His major dream is to someday have his own firm in an area associated with what he studied. 

In his spare time he enjoys playing soccer with a group at the university.  He will use the present loan to pay for his Masters Degree course.

loans.use: to pay for his schooling.

loans.name: Marco Antonio

texts.es:
Marco, es empleado, vive con su esposa y un hijo de 18 años de edad, él trabaja como motorista del ministerio de trabajo desde hace mucho tiempo, Marco es el responsable del hogar, cubriendo con su salario los gastos necesarios.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para comprar uniformes escolares de su hijo, pues se encuentra estudiando un tecnico en mecanica y su salario no cubre totalmente los gastos escolares, este préstamo le ayudara a comprar los uniformes y apoyar a su hijo.
Su aspiración es ver a su hijo hecho un profesional, con oportunidades de desarrollo y superación.
texts.en:
Marco is employed.  He lives with his wife and 18-year-old son.  He has worked as a driver for the Ministry of Labor for a long time.  Marco is responsible for his home covering expenses with his salary.

He is currently asking for a loan to buy his son’s school uniforms because he’s studying a technical Mechanics course and his salary doesn’t quite suffice for the school costs.  This loan will help him buy the uniforms and support his son’s efforts.  His wish is to see his son become a professional will opportunities for development and self improvement.

loans.use: to buy his son's school uniforms.

loans.name: Florencia

texts.es: Antonia tiene 49 años, radica en su ciudad natal con su esposo y sus 2 hijos en la casa que construyo a base de mucho esfuerzo. Aprendió por medio de un familiar a realizar costuras y por la necesidad apremiante de generarse ingresos para su hogar decide  implementar su propio taller. Desde hace 11 años continua elaborando mandiles para amas de casa, siendo su principal herramienta de trabajo, su maquina de coser. Es así que  todos los días trabaja en su taller, que tiene instalada en su misma casa. Su hermana la ayuda en la comercialización de sus mandiles, ya que una vez  terminados los lleva a distintos lugares de la ciudad. Esta forma de trabajar le ha traído buenas ganancias, eso recompensan las horas arduas de confeccionar. Es por eso que desea implementar con nuevas maquinas de coser, así como de otras herramientas para taller de costura. En su negocio siempre es necesario  el apoyo financiero de los proyectos que se propone, es por esta razón que siempre acude a MFP para concretar sus metas de las cuales esta muy agradecida por estos años de trabajo de las que hoy suman 8 oportunidades de crédito. Con el dinero que solicita,  lo invertirá en la compra de telas al por mayor.
texts.en:
Antonia, 49, lives in the city of her birth with her husband and two children in the house she built with much effort.  She learned from a family member how to sew and due to the pressing need to generate household income she decided to set up her own workshop.

She has been making aprons for housewives for the last 11 years.  Her main work tool is her sewing machine.  This is how she heads to her shop that’s installed in her house every day.  Her sister helps her sell the aprons which she takes to various parts of the city once they are finished.  This way of working has produced good profits which reward her for the hard hours spent sewing.  She’d like to buy new sewing machines as well as other tools for her workshop.  

Her business always requires financial support to do the projects she proposes.  Because of this she always calls on MFP to reach her goals and she is very grateful for all the years of work together which to date add up to 8 opportunities for loans.  She will use the requested funds to buy fabric at wholesale.

loans.use: to buy more fabric.

loans.name: Donia Margarita

texts.es:
Donia, vive con su familia su madre y una hija, es madre soltera y se dedica a la crianza de cerdos, este negocio  surgió por iniciativa propia, no tiene un horario definido.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de cerdos y eso le ayudara para incrementar la granja de los cerdos, ya que quiere crecer en el comercio y también abastecer a la clientela.
Su objetivo es comprarse su propia casa, por eso se esfuerza por mantener el negocio y contar con una mayor clientela.
texts.en: Donia lives with her family; her mother and a daughter.  She’s a single mother who raises pigs.  This business arose through her own initiative.  She does not have a fixed work schedule.  She’s asking for a loan to buy pigs to increase the herd size because she wants to grow in the marketplace and establish her clientele.  Her goal is to buy a house of her own which is why she strives to stay in business and have a larger clientele.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Maria Candelaria

texts.es:
María, vive con dos hijos, se dedica a la crianza D. cerdos y venta D. ropa, el negocio lo inicio por el apoyo D. sus suegros, la granja D. cerdos la tiene en su vivienda y el negocio D. la ropa la tiene instalada en un puesto en el mercado municipal.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra D. cerdos y también para invertir en el negocio D. ropa, comprándose blusas, camisas, ropa interior, la compra le ayudara a incrementar los dos negocios, permitiéndole servir D. una mejor manera.
Su aspiración es tener éxito en sus dos negocios, poder comercializar con los clientes, ofreciéndoles mercadería nueva, también que su hogar cuente con todo lo necesario para su vida diaria.
texts.en:
María lives with her two children.  She raises pigs and sells clothes.  The business was started with help from her in-laws.  She has her pig farm at home and the clothing sales business is in a stand in the municipal market.  

She is asking for the loan to buy pigs and also to invest in clothing; she’ll buy blouses, shirts and underwear.  The purchase will help her increase both businesses allowing her to proviD. better service.  

Her goal is to be successful at both businesses to be able to sell her customers new merchandise and also that her home has all that is necessary for daily life.

loans.use: to buy pigs and to buy clothes.

loans.name: Candelaria De Jesus

texts.es:
Candelaria, vive con su esposo y dos hijos, ella se dedica a la venta D. ropa, el negocio lo tiene en el mercado municipal donD. posee un puesto estable, ahí atienD. a toda su clientela.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra D. mercadería, ya que desea abastecer el negocio con ropa interior D. adultos y D. niños, ropa infantil y blusas, camisas para adultos, al comprar esta mercadería estará fortaleciendo el negocio, brindando un mejor servicio a los clientes.
Su objetivo es mejorar el negocio, contar con financiamientos que puedan ayudarla para alcanzar el crecimiento deseado, dándole a su familia una mayor seguridad por sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Candelaria lives with her husband and two children.  She sells clothes.  Her business is in the municipal market where she has a fixed stand where she tends to her clientele.

She is asking for a loan to buy merchandise.  She wants to stock the business with adult and children’s underwear, children’s clothes and shirts for adults.  Buying this merchandise will strengthen the business providing better customer service.

Her goal is to improve the business, to have financing that will help her reach the desired level of growth thus providing her family with more security thanks to the income.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Betty

texts.es: Betty es parte D. una familia constituida, vive con su esposo y sus 5 hijos en su casa que es propia. En la búsqueda D. oportunidades para generase ingresos económicos, decidió dedicarse en la elaboración D. bordados artesanales sobre prendas típicas D. su región. DesD. hace 42 años que realiza esta actividad y en compañía D. sus hijas, quienes la ayudan en esta ardua labor. Pero cuando hay épocas que tiene mayor demanda, ahí es cuando más necesitan D. mano D. obra, por ello contrata a otras personas para cumplir con el pedido que le hacen sus clientes y D. esta manera mantener el buen concepto que tienen sus clientes D. su servicio. Ante esto ha decidido implementar más su taller con más equipos y materiales. Es una D. las integrantes D. mayor trayectoria en su banco comunal a través D. MFP, siempre le agrado trabajar en equipo. Con el dinero que solicita, comprará más bastidores y caballetes que son los instrumentos básicos D. su actividad.
texts.en:
Betty is part of a family.  She lives with her husband and five children in a house that’s hers.  Seeking economic opportunities to generate income, she decided to make artisanal embroidery on traditional, regional clothing.  She’s been in this activity for 42 years together with her daughters who help her do this hard work.  However, in times of high demand when more hands are needed, she hires other people in order to fill orders from customers and maintain the good reputation she has among them regarding her service.  In face of this, she decided to equip her shop with more equipment and supplies.

She is one of the members of the communal bank with the longest history with MFP.  She has always enjoyed team work.  She will use the money requested to buy embroidery frames and trestle work tables which are the basic tools for this activity.

loans.use: to buy embroidery frames and work tables.

loans.name: Evelyn Yazaira

texts.es:
Evelyn, tiene 28 años de edad, tiene un hijo de 6 años de edad, es madre soltera, vive con su familia y administra una tienda donde ofrece productos de primera necesidad.
Actualmente quiere invertir en mercadería para el negocio, por lo tanto solicita un préstamo para comprarse pastas, condimentos, boquitas, pan, huevos, aceite, azúcar y demás productos que son necesarios para el negocio, ya que son productos que los clientes demandan.
Su objetivo es mantener el negocio bien surtido, ya que de él depende su hijo, por lo mismo quiere garantizase el bienestar del pequeño, manteniendo el negocio rentable.
texts.en: Evelyn, 28, has a six-year-old son; she’s a single mother.  She lives with her family and runs a general store where she stocks basic need items.  She wants to invest in merchandise for the store so is asking for a loan to buy pasta, condiments, snacks, bread, eggs, oil, sugar and other products that are needed for the store because they are products that customers demand.  Her goal is to keep the store well stocked because her son depends on it and she wants to keep it profitable because she wants to guarantee her little one’s wellbeing.

loans.use: Para comprarse pastas, condimentos, boquitas, pan, huevos, aceite, azúcar.

loans.name: Noel Agustin

texts.es: Noel Agustín él se dedica a la compra de mariscos, empezó este negocio con un hermano. El trabaja todos los días desde las 5 de la mañana hasta las 6 de la tarde pues tiene que levantarse temprano para alistar su bote y todas las herramientas necesarias para su trabajo. El financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de motor, proporcionarle mejoras a su lancha y compra de combustible que está muy caro. Desea realizar mejoras en su vivienda.
texts.en:
Noel Agustín is a seafood merchant; he started the business with his brother.  He works every day starting at 5am and goes until 6pm because he has to rise early to get his boat and all the necessary tools ready for work.

The loan he’s requesting is to buy an engine, to do some repair work on his boat and to buy fuel which is very expensive.  He hopes to do some home improvements.

loans.use: to buy an engine and to buy fuel.

loans.name: María Hermelinda

texts.es:
María tiene 25 años de edad, es  soltera y vive con su madre y sus dos hermanos, ella cuenta con casa propia casa, la misma que esta ubicada en  zona rural, en el distrito de Chocope en el departamento de La Libertad , 

María se dedica a la venta de leche de vaca fresca, la cual distribuye desde hace 02 años, ella se dedica a esta actividad y la mayor parte de su venta la realiza a en la zona donde reside a sus amigo y familiares , así como también en el distrito Paijan.

María esta solicitando un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 nuevos soles para que pueda invertir en la compra de una motocarguero,(moto con cabina para transportar cosas), en la cual transportara sus leche, con mayor facilidad.

María tiene buenas referencias por parte de sus vecinos y conocidos,pues la describen como una persona trabajadora y responsable.
texts.en: María is 25 years old, single, and lives with her mother and her two siblings. She has her own house, which is located in the rural zone of the district of Chocope, La Libertad department. María sells fresh cow milk, which she has been doing for two years. She makes most of her sales in the area where she lives, to her friends and acquaintances, as well as in the district of Paijan. María is requesting a loan of 1,500 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa in order to buy a motocarguero (a motorcycle with a cabin for transporting things), which she will use to transport her milk more easily. María has good references from her neighbors and people who know her, as they describe her as a hard-working and responsible person.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle for transporting her milk

loans.name: Camino Al Mar Group

texts.es:
Este Banco comunal se llama “Camino al Mar” conformado por 17 emprendedoras que se dedican a diferentes rubros, entre los cuales se encuentran venta de leña, artesanía, venta de huevos, criadero de gallinas, preparación de mermeladas y venta de hortalizas. Todos ellos pertenecientes a la ciudad de Puerto Montt.
Marina presidenta del Banco comunal, quien en la foto aparece en el primer lugar de la fila de derecha a izquierda, usa una boina color café y viste una chaqueta color negro. Ella se dedica a la artesanía, específicamente teje en un telar, ha realizado diferentes tipos de cursos, que le han permitido instruirse en el rubro. Comenzó en éste rubro desde hace 6 meses.
Actualmente está terminando un curso de telar y expondrá lo aprendido en una feria de artesanía. Además se inscribió nuevamente en un taller de telar mapuche.
Sus materiales, específicamente lanas las compra en un depósito, estas deben ser de color blanco para que las pueda teñir con colores naturales, que ella misma prepara, buscando matices de arboles. Para esto necesita sulfato y fijador. 
Con los telares realiza alfombras, bajadas de cama, tapices y bufandas. Con el crédito comprará lanas hiladas y blancas. 
Sus metas son instalar su negocio con un local establecido en una feria artesanal. 
Marina vive junto a su esposo y sus dos hijos de 28 y 16 años de edad, sus sueños son poder brindarles una mejor calidad de vida. 
Ella se siente muy contenta y agradecida de los servicios brindados por Fondo Esperanza. Ya que con éste capital podrá invertir en su negocio, lo que le permitirá generar más ganancias. Respecto al grupo comenta que todos son muy comprometidos, tanto con la institución, como con cada uno de sus negocios. 
Puerto Montt es una ciudad del sur de Chile, ubicada en la región de Los Lagos. Una de las atracciones de Puerto Montt son sus bellos paisajes verdes; sus playas poco frecuentadas; su gastronomía y especialmente la reputación de sus pescados y mariscos y sus artesanías. Es también la puerta de entrada a la Isla Grande de Chiloé, rica en tradiciones y leyendas.
texts.en:
This communal bank is called “Camino al Mar” (Road to the Sea) and has 17 entrepreneurs who are in a variety of occupations like: firewood sales, crafts making, egg sales, raising chickens, jam making and vegetable sales.  All of them are from Puerto Montt.

Marina, communal bank President, in the photo is in the fist spot from right to left wearing a brown cap and black jacket.  She is a crafts person, specifically, she weaves on a loom.  She has taken several courses that have instructed her in this line of work.  She started the work six months ago.

She is currently about to finish her weaving course and will exhibit what she learned at a crafts fair.  In addition, she’s signed up for a course to learn traditional Mapuche weaving.  

Her supplies, specifically yarn, are purchased at a warehouse.  These must be plain white so that she can dye them with natural dyes that she herself prepares aiming for tree-like hues.  She needs sulfate and fixative for this.  She makes rugs, bed skirts, wall hangings and mufflers on her looms.
Her goals are to set up her business in an established locale at a crafts market.  Marina lives with her husband and two children who are 28 and 16 years of age.  Her dream is to be able to provide them with better quality of life. 

She is very happy with and grateful for the services provided by Fondo Esperanza because she’ll be able to invest this capital in her business and that will lead to more profits.  With respect to the group, she comments that they are all very committed both to the institution and to each one of their businesses.

Puerto Montt is a city in south Chile located in the Los Lagos region.  Among Puerto Montt’s attractions are its beautiful, green scenery, its uncrowded beaches, its cuisine and especially the reputation of its fish, seafood and crafts.  It’s also the entryway to the Isla Grande de Chiloé, rich in tradition and legends.

loans.use: to buy threaded wool and plain wool.

loans.name: Yonny

texts.en:
Yonny is 46 years old and the single mother of three children who are 5, 21 and 23 years old. All three of her children live with her, and two of them attend university. She has a business selling crafts such as masks and quilts. She works every day selling these products and enjoys the creative aspect of her work. 

Yonny is asking for a loan so that she may buy more crafts to sell such as masks, quilts and different types of bags. Yonny is a hardworking woman and is committed to making the necessary loan payments on time.

loans.use: to buy more masks, quilts and bags to sell.

loans.name: Rosa Emma

texts.es:
Rosa  tiene 67 años de edad, ella es casada, y no tiene hijos, vive en casa propia, la cual está ubicada en el Caserío Pueblo Libre en  el distrito de Tambogrande. Rosa vive en una zona rural de este distrito. Y no cuenta aún con servicio básicos.
