Rosa se dedica a la crianza de ganado ovino y aves de corral, los cuales al alcanzar tamaño y peso ideal los comercializa en el mercado local, esta actividad la desarrolla desde hace 4 años, además cuenta con  0.68 has de terreno agrícola sembrados de mango y limón que son herencia de sus padres, los cuales ella aprovecha, para poder trabajarlos

Rosa esta solicitando un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para que pueda comprar alimentos balanceados para el engorde de ganado y aves con la finalidad de lograr un  mejor tamaño y peso en menos tiempo y así rotar más rápido sus animales

Rosa es una persona bastante conocida y estimada por los pobladores de la zona en donde trabaja y en donde vive las personas que la conocen la consideran un persona tranquila y bastante trabajadora.
texts.en:
Rosa is 67 years old, married, and does not have any children. She lives in her own house in the hamlet of Pueblo Libre, in Tambogrande district. Rosa lives in a rural zone of this district and does not have even basic services.

Rosa raises sheep and poultry. Once they have reached an ideal size and weight, she sells them in the local market. She has been doing this work for four years. She also works 0.68 hectares of farmland that she has planted with mangoes and lemons, which she inherited from her parents.

Rosa is requesting a loan of 1,000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa. She will buy a balanced diet to fatten her sheep and birds so that they will reach a good size in less time, so that she can turn over her animals more quickly.

Rosa is rather well-known and esteemed by those who live in the area where she lives and works. People who know her consider her to be a calm and hard-working woman.

loans.use: to buy a balanced diet to fatten her sheep and birds so that they reach a better size

loans.name: Oscar Armando

texts.es:
Oscar, tiene 33 años de edad, es padre de tres hijos de 4, 6 y 9 años de edad, él es agricultor siembra cada año una manzana de terreno, tiene una larga experiencia en cultivos.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de insumos como abono y pesticidas, para el tratamiento del cultivo, permitiéndole tener una buena cosecha.
Su objetivo es que a través del cultivo pueda obtener ganancias y poder sustentar las necesidades del hogar.
texts.en:
Oscar is 33 years old and is the father of three children, ages 4, 6, and 9.  He is a farmer and plants a plot of land each year, so he has lots of experience with crops.

He is asking for this loan in order to buy supplies such as fertilizer and pesticide to treat his crops.  This will allow him to have a good harvest.

His goal is to produce a good income through his crops and be able to support his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticide.

loans.name: Omar

texts.es: "Dentro de 5 años me veo dirigiendo un centro de cómputo grande y desarrollando sistemas de información de acuerdo a las nuevas tecnologías de información. Me inspira el conocimiento de estar al tanto de las nuevas tecnologías y conocer hacia donde se dirige el mundo. La diferencia entre muchos estudiantes y yo es la experiencia y el interés que tengo, el deseo de aprender nuevas cosas. El finalizar esta segunda carrera ha sido un desafio por el tiempo que requiere tanto de asistencia como de estudio en casa, las obligaciones en el trabajo ha sido un limitante que lo he superado a base de eficiencia y planificación. Me voy a graduar de Ingeniero en Sistemas".
texts.en: “Within five years I see myself managing a large computing center and developing information systems built on the latest information technologies.  I’m inspired by the knowledge of being up with the latest technologies and knowing in which direction the world is going.  The difference between me and many other students is the experience and interest that I have in learning new things.  Completing this course of study has been a challenge because of the time required in attending class as well as studying at home.  Work obligations have also been a limiting factor that I have overcome through planning and efficiency.  I’m going to graduate as a systems engineer.”

loans.use: to pay tuition.

loans.name: Jose Fernando

texts.es:
José, es agricultor, vive con su esposa y su hijo, posee casa propia, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz, pipián, también atiende la ganadería, tiene 15 años de estar en la actividad y posee gran experiencia.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la siembra de maíz, pues debe aplicarles abono para fortalecer la planta, este préstamo le ayudara a contar con lo necesario para tener una buena y abundante cosecha.
Su aspiración es que su producción mejore, realizar un buen trabajo para poder llevar a su familia el sustento diario.
texts.en:
José is a farmer who lives with his wife and one son in a home of his own.  He raises corn, pipián, and also livestock.  He’s been doing so for 15 years and has great experience.

He is asking for this loan to be able to plant corn.  He needs to be able to fertilize the plants in order to strengthen them.  This loan will help him get the necessary supplies in order to have a good harvest.

His aspiration is to improve his production and do good work in order to support his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Dolia

texts.es: Dolia radica en la ciudad de Huancayo desde hace 20 años,  tiene 46 años y vive con sus hijos en su casa que es propia. Hace más de 10 años que se dedica en la venta de verduras en un mercado de su zona, se abastece de manera Inter diaria en el mercado central y con la ayuda de sus hijos  instala su puesto de ventas y lista para atender a sus clientes. A lo largo de estos años ha ido mejorando, poco a poco su negocio va creciendo al igual que sus ganancias; pues su meta es tener un puesto más amplio con mayor variedad de productos. Paralelo a ello, vende granos en las ferias comerciales que existen en zonas aledañas a su comunidad, por lo que le genera ingresos extras para la economía de su hogar, y por tal espera continuar desarrollando ambos negocios. Un día recibió la invitación de una de sus vecinas para formar parte del grupo solidario con MFP y desde ese entonces han pasado mas de 3 años de trabajo sumando esta su novena oportunidad de crédito de la cual se siente muy orgullosa de su permanencia y de su buen record crediticio por la puntualidad que ha demostrado por lo que renueva su compromiso de pago. Con el dinero que solicita, aumentará su capital de trabajo, tanto en verduras como en granos para vender, ya que tiene mucha demanda de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Dolia has been living in the city of Huancayo for the past 20 years.  She is 46 years old and lives with her children in a home of her own.  She has been selling vegetables at a market within the zone for the past ten years.  She gets her supplies from the central market and, with her children’s help, sets up her stall and serves her customers.  Things have been getting better little by little over the years and her business and income have been growing.  Her goal is to have a bigger stall, with a greater variety of products.  At the same time, Dolia also sells basic grains at the commercial fairs in her community’s surrounding zones.  This earns her extra income for her household expenses.  She expects to continue developing both businesses.

One day one of her neighbors invited her to form part of this group with MFP, and since then she’s been working for three years and this will be her ninth opportunity for a loan.  She feels very proud of her longevity and the punctuality she has demonstrated in making her payments.  She will use the money from this loan to increase her working capital and buy vegetables and grains to sell because her customer demand has been high.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables and grains.

loans.name: Sandra Patricia

texts.es:
Sandra, se dedica a la venta de enchapes de oro y plata, también vende lociones, es madre soltera, lleva 8 años de dedicándose al negocio, del cual ha recibido los ingresos para solventar sus necesidades.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de enchapes tanto de oro como de plata, también lociones, esta inversión es para surtir de nuevos productos y ofrecer a la clientela lo mejor.
Su objetivo es mantener el negocio fuerte, conquistar más clientes y generar mayores ingresos para el hogar.
texts.en:
Sandra sells gold and silver jewelry.  She also sells lotions.  She is a single mother who has been running her business for eight years.  The business has made her the income she needs to cover her needs.  She is requesting this loan to buy both gold and silver jewelry, and lotions.  This investment will help her stock her business with new products so that she can offer her customers the best.

Sandra's goal is to keep her business strong, gain more customers and make more income for her household.

loans.use: to buy gold and silver jewelry, and lotions

loans.name: Aguacatillo Group

texts.es:
El Aguacatillo lo conforman tres personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras. La coordinadora del grupo es la señora María quien vende pinol y verduras desde hace 5 años en el mercado. La venta de semanal de ella es de 2,250 aproximadamente. 
Con el crédito comprará maíz, cacao y verduras para el negocio.
Los otros integrantes son Teresa quien se dedica al comercio de frutas y verduras desde hace 5 años y Ana realiza almohadas y vende semillas de marañón desde hace 5 años.
texts.en:
The 'El Aguacatillo' group is made up of three hard-working and entrepreneurial people.  The group's coordinator is María who has been selling 'pinol' (flour made from toasted corn) and vegetables in the market for five years.  Her weekly sales total approximately 2,250 cordobas.

María will use her loan to buy corn, cacao and vegetables for her business.

The other members of this group are Teresa who has been selling fruit and vegetables for five years and Ana who has been making pillows and selling cashew nuts for five years.

loans.use: to buy corn, cacao and vegetables

loans.name: Santa Isabel Group

texts.es: Sabina Noria y Celia conforman el grupo solidario Santa Isabel. Sabina se dedica a la venta y elaboración de comida, hace más de 21 años que tiene este negocio, ella ha puesto mucho empeño para salir adelante con este negocio, Sabina tiene una gran variedad de clientes que le solicitan variedad de platillos, el carisma y el amor que brinda es lo que hace que sus clientes la busquen. El financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, verduras, carnes, pollos entre otros.
texts.en:
Sabina Noria and Celia are the members of the Santa Isabel solidarity group. Sabina makes and sells food for a living. She has had her business for over 21 years. She has put a great deal of effort into moving her business forward. Sabina has a good variety of customers who order a variety of dishes from her. Her charisma and the love she offers are what make her customers seek her out.

The loan she is requesting will be used to buy rice, beans, sugar, oil, vegetables, meat, chicken, and other things.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, sugar, oil, vegetables, meats, chicken, etc.

loans.name: Marta Lorena

texts.es:
Marta, es comerciante, vive con su esposo y dos hijos, ella se dedica a la compra y venta de mariscos,  se traslada a otros municipios para ofrecer la mercadería, pues ya tiene clientes a quienes les distribuye, lleva 7 años en el negocio.
Actualmente necesita financiamiento para la compra de mariscos, pues quiere incrementar la mercadería comprando al mayoreo pescado, langostas, camarón, que en su mayoría demandan los clientes.
Su visión es generar nuevas rutas de venta, pudiendo conquistar otros clientes que le permitan crecer y generar mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Marta is a saleswoman who lives with her husband and two children.  Her business is buying and selling seafood.  She travels to other towns to sell her merchandise as she already has customers who she delivers to.  She has been in this business for seven years.

Marta currently needs a loan to buy seafood as she would like to increase her stock of merchandise by purchasing fish, lobsters and shrimp wholesale.  These are the products that most of her customers request.

Marta's dream is to create new sales routes and gain new customers which will allow her to grow and make better income.

loans.use: to buy seafood (fish, lobsters and shrimp)

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
Luz, vive con su hija, es madre soltera, se dedica a la venta de gallinas, frutas y algunas verduras, tiene 20 años de dedicarse al negocio, posee experiencia y las ventas las realiza de forma ambulante.
Actualmente Luz solicita un préstamo para comprar frutas y verduras, pues quiere aumentar el negocio,  su compra será en sandias, jocotes, pepinos, para continuar ofreciendo a sus clientes las frutas complaciendo sus gustos.
Su objetivo es que a través de financiamiento pueda crecer y aumentar sus ventas, también ayudar a su hija para que pueda superarse.
texts.en:
Luz lives with her daughter.  She is a single mother who sells hens, fruit and some vegetables.  She has been in business for 20 years.  She has experience and makes her sales as an itinerant vendor.

Luz is requesting this loan to buy fruit and vegetables as she would like to increase her business.  She will buy watermelons, jocotes (hog plums) and cucumbers so that she can continue offering fruit to satisfy her customers.

Luz' goal is to use loans to grow her business and increase her sales.  She would also like to help her daughter to do well in life.

loans.use: to buy fruit and veg (watermelons, jocotes and cucumbers) for her business

loans.name: Elsa

texts.es:
Elsa tiene  42 años D. edad, ella es casada con 03 hijos a su cargo. Vive en casa propia, la cual está ubicada en el Caserío Cruce D. Vega, en el distrito D. TambogranD.. Elsa  vive en la parte rural  D. este distrito y aun no cuenta con servicio D. agua, solo con el D. luz.

Elsa se dedica a la venta D. cerveza en su propio domicilio en el cual atienD. los días sábados y domingos, también se dedica a la venta D. medicinas naturales  para  las cuales  recorre caseríos cercanos y vendiendo al crédito y al contado según sea el caso.

Elsa esta solicitando un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa D. 2000 nuevos soles para que pueda adquirir cerveza en una mayor proporción y más productos medicinales para su comercialización y D. esta  manera pueda ampliar su negocio y percibir mejores ingresos.

Elsa es una mujer bastante trabajadora y entregada a su familia. Su mayor anhelo es seguir creciendo como empresaria y poder ayudar asu esposo abrindarle a sus hijos una mejor calidad D. vida.
texts.en:
Elsa is 42 years old, married, and has three children that she cares for. She lives in her own house, which is located in the hamlet of Cruce D. Vega, in the district of TambogranD.. Elsa lives in the rural part of the district and does not have water service - only light.

Elsa sells beer from her own house on Saturdays and Sundays. She also sells natural medicines, which she does throughout the nearby hamlets. She sells on credit or for cash, on a case-by-case basis.

Elsa is requesting a loan of 2,000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa, which she will use to stock beer in greater quantities. She will also buy more medicinal products to sell so that she can expand her business and earn better profits.

Elsa is quite a hard-working woman and very dedicated to her family. Her greatest dream is to continue growing as a businesswoman and to be able to help her husband offer their children a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy beer in greater quantities and to buy more medicinal products to sell

loans.name: Maria Antonia

texts.es:
María, vive con sus hijos, se dedica a la venta de ropa variada nueva, también tamales, sus hijos le ayudan en la agricultura sembrando maíz, su negocio lo atiende de hace tres años pero siempre vigila los cultivos.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la siembra de 4 manzanas de terreno de maíz, pues debe contar con insumos para aplicarlos al cultivo, tratando de que le produzca lo mejor y abundante, por lo mismo necesita abono abundante.
Su objetivo con el préstamo es mejorar la cosecha de este año, que espera en que las condiciones del clima sean favorables, para no tener dificultades.
texts.en:
María lives with her children.  She sells assorted new clothes and tamales  Her children help her with the farming growing corn.  She’s had her business for the last three years but she always watches over her crops.

She is asking for the loan for her four manzana (Central American land measure) corn field because she has to have farming supplies to apply to it so that it will produce better, more abundant crops; she needs ample amounts of manure.

Her goal with this loan is to improve this year’s harvest.  She hopes that weather conditions will be favorable in order not to have any difficulties.

loans.use: to buy manure.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy basic grains with 40% of her loan and new clothing and cosmetics with the rest

loans.name: Perla Lisbet

texts.es: La señora Perla Lisbet es una mujer muy emprendedora que a pesar de la situación económica que esta en el país, cuenta con su negocio de venta de ropa usada de buena calidad que ofrece a sus amistades y vecinos aun bajo precio. Perla es madre de dos pequeños a los cuales quiere ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida es por ello que opto por dedicarse al negocio para no descuidarlos y darles toda la atención. El negocio ha permanecido 4 años por la atención que ofrece y amabilidad al atender a sus clientes, esta es parte de su fuente de ingresos a parte la que su esposo gana por trabajar en maquiladora. Para que el negocio siga generando ingresos necesita comprar mercancía de temporada.
texts.en:
Perla Lisbet is a very enterprising woman who despite the economic situation in the country has her business selling good quality, used clothes to her friends and neighbors at affordable prices. 

Perla is the mother of two little ones that she wants to provide a better quality of life for.  This is why she opted for this type of business so that she could take care of them and give them all her attention.

The business has lasted four years due to the service she provides and the kindness with which she treats her customers.  This is part of her source of income besides what her husband earns working at an assembly plant.  

So that the business will continue to earn income she needs to buy seasonal merchandise.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Milagros Xiomara

texts.es: La Sra. Milagros, es madre soltera, tiene dos hijos de dos y seis años de edad, el de seis años asiste al colegio. Nuestra cliente se  dedica  a la venta de comida.  Eligió este tipo de trabajo por su mamá  que también vende comida  en el verano.  Ella  tiene  su negocio desde hace dos años  y gana aproximadamente 400 soles semanales.  Los desafíos  que enfrenta la Sra. Milagros es el cuidado de sus hijos ya que tiene q compartir su poco tiempo con ellos y el negocio, enfrenta este reto contando con el apoyo de su madre para el cuidado de sus hijos, mientras ella atiende el negocio. Su sueño de Milagros es tener un gran restaurante con variedades de platos y  así poder darle a sus hijos lo necesario. El crédito lo va a invertir  en comprar  más insumos y accesorios para el restaurante. Es una persona muy emprendedora y luchadora, se encuentra muy agradecida con la Caja Señor de Luren por la oportunidad prestada.
texts.en:
Milagros is a single mother; she has two children who are 2 and 6 years of age, the six-year-old attends school.  

Our client sells food.  She chose this type of work thanks to her mother who also sold food in the summer.  She’s had the business for the last two years and earns about 400 soles per week.

The challenge Milagros faces is caring for her children because she has to share what little time she has with them and the restaurant.  Her mother helps her face this challenge caring for the children while she tends to the business.

Milagros’ dream is to have a large restaurant with a variety of dishes to provide her children with what’s necessary.  She will use the loan to buy more ingredients and accessories for the restaurant.  

She is an enterprising, tenacious person who is very grateful to Caja Señor de Luren for the opportunity provided.

loans.use: to buy necessary ingredients for her restaurant.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Elena

texts.es: Elena tiene 31 años, vive en compañía de su esposo y sus 2 hijos en su casa propia. Sus deseos de superación la llevaron a emprender con éxito el negocio familiar que hoy tiene de manera sólida y junto a su esposo continúan dando todos sus esfuerzos, Tiene 11 años y medio dedicándose en la elaboración de ladrillos, que lo hace por millares. Recuerda que en un inicio vendía los ladrillos que producían otra fabricas, pero poco a poco logró ahorras y con ello arrendó un terreno amplio, lugar en el que ahora elabora ella misma los ladrillos. Como ya conocía la dinámica del mercado pudo conseguir rápidamente clientela, permitiéndole poner en flota su negocio. Para el futuro es  espera abastecerse de insumos y así no dejar de producir más ladrillos. Considera que para crecer es necesario apoyarse de los créditos ya que lo ha comprobado en su propia experiencia de las cuales viene trabajando de la mano con MFP  durante 11 oportunidades en las que viene recibiendo crédito. Con el dinero que solicita, le servirá para la compra de insumos que siempre utiliza en la fabricación de sus ladrillos.
texts.en:
Elena, 31, lives with her husband and two children in her own house.  Her wish to improve herself led her to successfully start a family business that today is solid and, together with her husband, she continues putting all her efforts into it.  

She’s been manufacturing bricks for 11 and a half years; she makes them by the thousands.  She remembers how in the beginning she’d sell bricks made by other factories but gradually managed to save up and rent a spacious lot where she now makes the bricks herself.  Since she already knew the market dynamics she was able to quickly secure customers and launch her business.  

For the future she hopes to stock up on raw materials in order not to stop making bricks.  She believes that in order to grow one has to rely on loans, something she’s learned first hand working with MFP on 11 loan opportunities to date.  She will use the requested funds to buy the raw materials she always uses to make bricks.

loans.use: to buy brick making supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build and plaster a room.

loans.name: Narcisa Maria

texts.es:
Narcisa de 30 años, es una mujer trabajadora que vende ropa a varios clientes. Ha trabajado hace tres años atrás vendiendo ropa para poder mantener a su familia. Tiene en su mercadería de ropa pantalones, blusas, camisas etc. Tiene muchas proyecciones con su negocio por eso quiere continuar trabajando. 

Tiene tres hijos de 13, 11 y 6 años que estudian en una escuela fiscal por ahora ella tiene muchas aspiraciones con su trabajo porque le ha ayudado a mantener a sus hijos. Con el préstamo quiere comprar pantalones, camisas, blusas etc.
texts.en:
Narcisa, 30, is a hard working woman who sells clothes to various customers.  She’s worked for three years selling clothes to support her family.  She has merchandise like pants, blouses, shirts, etc.  She has several projections for her business so wants to continue to work.

She has three children who are 13, 11 and 6 years of age and going to public school.  For now, she has many hopes for her work because it’s helped her support her children.  She will use the loan to buy pants, shirts, blouses, etc.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Maria Guadalupe

texts.es: La señora María Guadalupe es  muy trabajadora y responsable, es una de las muchas mujeres que hay en el mundo que solas salen adelante y buscan la manera de tener un ingreso extra para sostener los gastos del hogar. María Guadalupe hace varios años quedo viuda y a su cargo quedo una hija las mas pequeña y le dio estudios para que se superara, de la manera que obtuvo ingresos es trabajando en la limpieza de casas ajenas al igual teniendo su propio negocio los fines de semana, ofreciendo la venta de hamburguesas, tacos, tortas y pollo frito. El negocio es llamado “Fried Chiken Lupita” al que desea comprar materia prima como lo es pan, ingredientes, refrescos, para seguir ofreciendo a sus clientes calidad y buen servicio.
texts.en: María Guadalupe is a very hardworking and responsible woman who, like many women in this world, must work alone to provide for herself.  She had to seek out a means to generate extra income to pay the household expenses.  María Guadalupe became a widow a number of years ago, and she was left with a small daughter to care for and educate.  The way that she was able to get income was working to clean other people's houses, and she also had her own business on the weekends offering hamburgers, tacos, tortas and fried chicken for sale.  Her business is called "Fried Chicken Lupita."  She wants to buy supplies for this business such as bread, ingredients, and soft drinks, so that she can continue to offer her customers quality products and good service.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her business

loans.name: Husein

texts.en:
Husein is a 39-year-old married man and father of five children. He raises cows on his own farm and takes good care of them in order to ensure they give him the best milk to sell, and benefit from the milk's selling income. He is a well-known man, with a good reputation.  He is a hard worker and seeks perfection in his work and for his family members. He hopes to provide his children with the best education.

It has been three years since Husein started his dairy business; he provides the best fresh milk ever. To ensure improvements in production, he has requested a loan from Al Majmoua. He will use the loan to buy wooden logs to fix up the farm with a good fence and to clean the farm more, which will keep it healthy and comfortable for the cows and thus increase their productivity. He hopes to improve his business more and more in the future by expanding his farm and increasing the number of cows he owns.

loans.use: To buy wooden logs to fix up the farm with a fence and to better clean the farm

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to plaster and weatherproof.

loans.name: Teodosia

texts.es:
Teodosia tiene 60 años de edad, ella es madre de cuatro hijos tres casados y una soltera. Teodosia vive con su esposo en el distrito de Catacaos en es departamento de Piura, su comunidad es mediana y cuentan con los servicios básicos de agua y luz 

Teodosia se dedica a la producción y comercialización de artículos de artesanía  en general además se dedica a la venta de gaseosas golosinas y otros como productos de belleza, para esto ella ha instalado su negocio en su domicilio. Teodosia cuenta con varios años de experiencia en el rubro y cuenta con clientela ya establecida y fidelizada en la zona.

Teodosia esta solicitando un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para invertir en incremento de productos de belleza y gaseosa así como también materia prima para realizar sus artesanías 

Teodosia es una mujer responsable  con muy buenas referencias, las personas que la conocen le tiene mucha estima y la describen como una persona tranquila y trabajadora..
texts.en:
Teodosia is 60 years old.  She is the mother of four children; three are married and one is single.  Teodosia lives with her husband in the district of Catacaos, department of Piura.  It is an average community and has basic water and electricity services. 

Generally, Teodosia makes and sells artisanal crafts.  In addition, she sells soft drinks, candy, and other items such as beauty products.  Her business is installed in her home.  Teodosia has several years of experience in the business and already has established and loyal customers in the area.  

Teodisia is requesting a loan of 1000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa to invest in the increase of beauty products and soft drinks as well as raw material to make her artisanal crafts.  

Teodesia is a responsible woman with many good references.   People who know her have a high regard for her and describe her as calm and hardworking.

loans.use: to purchase raw material to make artisanal crafts, and to buy beauty products and other items such as soft drinks.

loans.name: Jorge Alberto

texts.es: Jorge Alberto y su esposa cuentan con un negocio de abarrotes denominado “Miscelánea Lucero” que ya tiene 8 años abierto al público ofreciendo variedad de producto y buena calidad. La esposa de Jorge atiende el negocio  por las mañanas mientras el trabaja en una tortillería y por las tardes el se hace cargo para que ella se dedique a los quehaceres del hogar y cuidar a sus hijos.
texts.en: Jorge Alberto and his wife have a grocery store called “Miscelánea Lucero” that’s been in operation 8 years offering the general public a variety of good quality products.  Jorge’s wife tends to the store during the morning while he works at a tortilla shop and in the afternoons he takes over watching the store so that she can do housework and care for the children.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Najah

texts.en:
Najah is a 55-year-old widow. She opened her grocery store 11 years ago to ensure her livelihood, and she doesn't ask for help from others. As a widow with no one to take care of her, Najah put a premium on improving her social and financial situation by increasing her store’s inventory so she could increase her income and cover most of her expenses.

Najah is well-liked by most of her neighbors, who really encourage her to improve her situation. Like most grocery-store owners, Najah is requesting a loan from Al Majmoua, a Kiva partner, before the holy month of Ramadan so she can increase her stock of goods with dates, special Ramadan syrups, and nuts.  This is her third loan.

Najah is a borrower in good standing, and her previous loans have had a great impact on her business and social situation.  Najah hopes to stay healthy so she can improve her business and keep on meeting her needs.

loans.use: To increase her store’s  inventory  with dates, special Ramadan syrups, and nuts.

loans.name: Guilda

texts.en:
Guilda is a 27-year-old married woman and mother of two precious children. She works hard to provide them with a good and healthy life.

Guilda began selling clothes two years ago; she sells children's wear and accessories. She started the business to help her husband by increasing the family income to cover their expenses. This is Guilda’s first experience requesting a loan from Al Majmoua. She is preparing to for the holy month of Ramadan celebration, when all kids have to wear new clothes and celebrate the month.

Guilda hopes to expand her business more and more and to introduce women's and men's clothes to her shop as well.

loans.use: To increase her clothing stock for the Holy Ramadan celebration

loans.name: Roberto Jose

texts.es: Roberto casado, su esposa ama de casa, sus hijos estudian en la secundaria, como padre se  preocupa por el bienestar de su familia, siendo de necesidad mejorar la infraestructura de la vivienda. Trabaja en una empresa de zona franca desde hace tiempo. Se le ha presentado dificulta en cuanto al alza de los precios de materiales siéndole un poco más difícil para completar las mejoras.  Con el préstamo comprar materiales de construcción como: cemento, arena, piedrín, lamias de zinc, golosa, perlines, bloques, piedras canteras, hierro entre otros. Para cambiar el techo y construir un cuarto. Agradece a la financiera por el apoyo al desarrollo de su nivel de vida, ya que obtiene seguridad, protección y comodidad.
texts.en:
Roberto is married and  his spouse is a house wife, caring for their children who are in secondary school. The wife, like the father, is preoccupied about the family's wellbeing. They are both concerned about the infrastructure of their house.

Roberto has worked for some time in an enterprise in the local tax-fee zone. He is facing difficulties due to price rises for building materials such as cement, sand, gravel, sheets of zinc, rafters, cement blocks, quarry stones, and other items he needs, to replace the roof and construct a room.

Roberto is grateful to the financial institution for help in advancing his level of living by providing security, protection, and comfort.

loans.use: buy construction materials to build a room onto his house.

loans.name: Flor De San Antonio Group

texts.es:
La señora Elvira Lucia es casada, tiene 52 años D. edad, a cursado los 5 años D. educación primaria, tiene 4 hijos y ninguno está estudiando, se dedica a las actividades pecuarias, a la crianza D. animales domésticos, específicamente a la crianza D. cerdos, inicia este trabajo criando pollos ponedoras, cuenta con el apoyo D. su esposo en el trabajo que realiza.

DeciD. organiza un grupo para poder solicitar un préstamo que le servirá para ampliar su capital D. trabajo,  va a comprar as cerdos para crianza, y cuando estos crezcan los pueda vender y pueda recuperar su inversión. Ya que quiere contar  con una pequeña granja. Las demás integrantes del grupo se dedican a diferentes actividades: crianza D. animales, confección D. prendas, y a la venta D. ropa.
texts.en:
Elvira Lucia is married and is 52 years old.  She has a 5th graD. education, and has 4 children, none of whom are in school.  She works in livestock raising domesticated animals, particularly pigs.  She started out raising layer chickens, and she has the support of her husband in this work. 

She decided to organize a group to request a loan that will allow her to increase her working capital.  She is going to buy pigs to raise; when they grow she will be able to sell them and recoup her investment.  She wants to have a small farm.  The other members of this group have different businesses, including: raising animals, making garments and selling clothing.

loans.use: to buy pigs to raise

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to make home improvements.
